Ğ’ ĞŸĞµĞºĞ¸Ğ½Ğµ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ°Ğ»ÑÑ Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼ Â«ĞĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ, Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‚ÑŒÂ»
13.05.2017
Ğ’ ĞŸĞµĞºĞ¸Ğ½Ğµ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ°Ğ»ÑÑ Ğ¼ĞµĞ¶Ğ´ÑƒĞ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼ Â«ĞĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ, Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‚ÑŒÂ».
Ğ’ Ñ†ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ñ„Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºÑ€Ñ‹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼Ğ° Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½ÑĞ» ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğµ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ²ĞºĞ°Ñ‚ ĞœĞ¸Ñ€Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‘ĞµĞ².
ĞŸÑ€Ğ¾ĞµĞºÑ‚ Â«ĞĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ, Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‚ÑŒÂ», Ğ¾ÑĞ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¼ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ²Ñ‹ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹, Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑƒÑĞ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ´ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¼ĞµĞ¶Ğ´ÑƒĞ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ´Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½ĞµĞ¹ÑˆĞµĞµ ÑƒĞºÑ€ĞµĞ¿Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ ÑÑƒÑ‰ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²ÑƒÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¼ĞµÑ…Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ´Ğ²ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ´Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°.
Ğ£Ñ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ½ÑŒ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ°. ĞĞ°ÑˆĞ° ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°, Ğ½Ğ°Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´ÑÑ‰Ğ°ÑÑÑ Ğ² Ñ†ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ñ€Ğµ Ğ’ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑˆĞµĞ»ĞºĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‚Ğ¸, Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ° Ğ·Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ° Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ² ÑƒĞºÑ€ĞµĞ¿Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¼ĞµĞ¶Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾-ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ¸ ĞºÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… ÑĞ²ÑĞ·ĞµĞ¹.
ĞÑĞ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ½Ğ°Ñ Ñ†ĞµĞ»ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´ÑÑ‰ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼Ğ° Ğ·Ğ°ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ² Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ñ‚ĞµĞ½Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ€ÑˆÑ€ÑƒÑ‚Ğµ Ğ’ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑˆĞµĞ»ĞºĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‚Ğ¸, Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºĞµ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¼ĞµÑ…Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ² ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ´Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°, ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ñ€ĞµÑÑĞ° Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ğ², ÑƒĞºÑ€ĞµĞ¿Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ ĞºÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… ÑĞ²ÑĞ·ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¼ĞµĞ¶Ğ´Ñƒ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸ÑĞ¼Ğ¸, Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ ÑĞ¾Ğ´ĞµĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ñƒ Ğ¸ ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ.
Ğ¡ĞµĞ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ñ Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞ° ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° ÑƒĞ´ĞµĞ»ÑĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ²Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ ÑĞ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ´Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ñƒ ÑĞ¾ Ğ²ÑĞµĞ¼Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸. Ğ’Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ½ÑƒÑ Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼ ÑÑ‹Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ½ĞµÑ€ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ² Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ°Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ° Â«ĞĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ, Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‚ÑŒÂ».
Ğ’ Ñ€ĞµĞ·ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ¾ÑÑƒÑ‰ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ»ÑĞµĞ¼Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğµ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ° Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ²ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ° ĞœĞ¸Ñ€Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‘ĞµĞ²Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ»ĞµĞ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ñ€ĞµÑ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑĞ¸Ñ„Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ»ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñ‹ÑˆĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸, Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ½ĞµÑĞ° Ğ¸ Ñ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°, Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶ĞºĞµ ÑĞºÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹ÑˆĞ°ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ĞºÑƒÑ€ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¾ÑĞ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ² Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ¹ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ÑƒĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ğ¸, ĞµĞµ Ğ²Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ±Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ²Ğ½ĞµÑˆĞ½ĞµĞ¼ Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ½ĞºĞµ. ĞŸÑ€Ğ¾ĞµĞºÑ‚ Â«ĞĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ, Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‚ÑŒÂ», Ğ½Ğ°Ñ†ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ´Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½ĞµĞ¹ÑˆĞµĞµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾-ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ´Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¼ĞµĞ¶Ğ´Ñƒ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ’ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑˆĞµĞ»ĞºĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‚Ğ¸, Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞµÑ‚ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸ Ğ´ĞµĞ¼Ğ¾Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¹ Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°.
Ğ’ Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°ÑÑ‚ ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ğ² Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑÑ‚Ğ² Ğ¾ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¾ 30 ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½, Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¸ 130 ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½. Ğ’ Ğ½ĞµĞ¼ ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ²ÑƒÑÑ‚ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ“ĞµĞ½ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ ÑĞµĞºÑ€ĞµÑ‚Ğ°Ñ€ÑŒ ĞĞĞ, Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ Ğ’ÑĞµĞ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ±Ğ°Ğ½ĞºĞ°, Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµÑ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¼ĞµĞ¶Ğ´ÑƒĞ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¹.
Ğ¤Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼ Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºÑ€Ñ‹Ğ» ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑĞµĞ´Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒ ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ ĞĞ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¡Ğ¸ Ğ¦Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½ÑŒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ½. Ğ“Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ» Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ğ², ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ²ÑƒÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ² Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼Ğµ, Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ğ» Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸, Ñ†ĞµĞ»ÑÑ… Ğ¸ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ… Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ°.

TITLE: ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ ĞºÑĞ¿ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ÑƒÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ²Ğ¾Ñ€ Ğ¹ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞºÑÑ€ÑĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ± ÑÑ‚Ğ´Ğ¸

ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ ĞºÑĞ¿ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ÑƒÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ²Ğ¾Ñ€ Ğ¹ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞºÑÑ€ÑĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ± ÑÑ‚Ğ´Ğ¸
01.09.2025
ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ²ĞºĞ°Ñ‚ ĞœĞ¸Ñ€Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‘ĞµĞ² 1 ÑĞµĞ½Ñ‚ÑĞ±Ñ€ÑŒ ĞºÑƒĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ¢ÑĞ½ÑŒÑ†Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½ÑŒ ÑˆĞ°Ò³Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ½Ñ…Ğ°Ğ¹ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆĞºĞ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ”Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚ Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ²Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ»Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¸ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğº ÑÑ‚Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¥Ğ°Ğ»Ò› Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ Ğ Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ Ğ¡Ğ¸ Ğ¦Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½ÑŒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ½ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ´Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ´Ğ° Ğ‘ĞµĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ÑƒÑÑŒ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ ĞĞ»ĞµĞºÑĞ°Ğ½Ğ´Ñ€ Ğ›ÑƒĞºĞ°ÑˆĞµĞ½ĞºĞ¾, Ò²Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ Ğ‘Ğ¾Ñˆ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸ ĞĞ°Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ´Ñ€Ğ° ĞœĞ¾Ğ´Ğ¸, Ğ­Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ˜ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ ĞœĞ°ÑÑŠÑƒĞ´ ĞŸĞµĞ·ĞµÑˆĞºĞ¸Ñ‘Ğ½, ÒšĞ¾Ğ·Ğ¾Ò“Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ ÒšĞ°ÑĞ¸Ğ¼-Ğ–Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚ Ğ¢Ğ¾Ò›Ğ°ĞµĞ², ÒšĞ¸Ñ€Ò“Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¡Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ€ Ğ–Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ², ĞŸĞ¾ĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ˜ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ Ğ‘Ğ¾Ñˆ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¨Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ· Ğ¨Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ„, Ğ Ğ¾ÑÑĞ¸Ñ Ğ¤ĞµĞ´ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸ÑÑĞ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ’Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€ ĞŸÑƒÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ½, Ğ¢Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ­Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ Ğ°Ò³Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½, ÑˆÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³Ğ´ĞµĞº, Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢ Ğ±Ğ¾Ñˆ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ¸ ĞÑƒÑ€Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ•Ñ€Ğ¼ĞµĞºĞ±Ğ°ĞµĞ² Ğ²Ğ° ĞœĞ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ°ĞºÑĞ¸Ğ»Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ€ Ñ‚ÑƒĞ·Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ¸ Ğ˜Ğ¶Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ Ò›ÑĞ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ°ÑĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ€ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ£Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ±ĞµĞº Ğ¨Ğ°Ñ€ÑˆĞµĞµĞ² Ò›Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞ´Ğ¸.
ĞšÑƒĞ½ Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¼ÑƒĞ²Ğ¾Ñ„Ğ¸Ò›, Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ ĞºÑĞ¿ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ´Ğ° Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ²Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆĞºĞ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ò›Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒÒ³Ğ¾ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ° Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸, Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ²Ğ° Ñ…Ğ°Ğ»Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ Ğ°Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ·Ğ°Ñ€Ğ± Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ ÑĞ·Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ¸Ò› Ñ„Ğ¸ĞºÑ€ Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ Ğ¡Ğ¸ Ğ¦Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½ÑŒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° ÑÑĞ· Ğ±ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ€ ÑĞºĞ°Ğ½, Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ñ…Ğ°Ğ»Ò›Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞœÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº ĞºÑƒĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ò›ÑƒÑ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ´Ğ° ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ²ĞºĞ°Ñ‚ ĞœĞ¸Ñ€Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‘ĞµĞ² Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ ÑĞºÑĞ°Ğº ÑÑƒÑ€ÑŠĞ°Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ° Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ±, Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ° Ò³Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚ ÑÑ…ÑˆĞ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ±ÑƒĞ½Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¶ÑƒĞ´Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ½ÑƒĞ½Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ò³Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ÑŠĞºĞ¸Ğ´Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸.
ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· ÑƒÑ‡Ñ€Ğ°ÑˆÑƒĞ² Ğ¸ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›ÑƒÑ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±, Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢Ğ³Ğ° Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑĞºÑĞ°Ğº Ğ±Ğ°Ò³Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ˜ĞºĞºĞ¸Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ¸ Ğ¶Ğ°Ò³Ğ¾Ğ½ ÑƒÑ€ÑƒÑˆĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ‘ÑƒÑĞº Ò’Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ 80 Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ñ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸, ÑˆÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³Ğ´ĞµĞº, Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢Ğ³Ğ° Ğ°ÑŠĞ·Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ´ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ³Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ĞœÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº ĞºÑƒĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ½Ğ¾ÑĞ°Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ñ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ·Ğ³Ñƒ Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ÑƒÑ‡ÑƒĞ½ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¸Ğ·Ò³Ğ¾Ñ€ ÑÑ‚Ğ´Ğ¸.
ĞœĞ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ ÑƒÑˆĞ±Ñƒ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ğ» Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ò›Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº ÑˆĞ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ´ ÑÑ‚Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ˜ÑˆĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ½Ò›Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ¸, Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ± Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸, ĞºÑĞ¿ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑƒÑ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¸Ñ„Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸ÑˆĞ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¶Ğ°Ò³Ğ¾Ğ½ ÑĞ°Ğ²Ğ´Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‡Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸ Ñ…Ğ°Ğ»Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ Ñ…Ğ°Ğ²Ñ„ÑĞ¸Ğ·Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ²Ğ° Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ°Ñ€Ñ…Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸ Ğ°ÑĞ¾ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‚ÑƒÑ€ ĞµÑ‚ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ¾Ò›Ğ´Ğ°.
â€“ Ğ‘ÑƒĞ½Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¹ ÑˆĞ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€-Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ·Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ Ñ‚ÑƒÑˆÑƒĞ½Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸ â€“ Ğ±Ñƒ Ñ„Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ñ‚ Ò›Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº ÑĞ¼Ğ°Ñ, Ğ±Ğ°Ğ»ĞºĞ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ±ĞµĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ‘Ğ½ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ´Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ°Ò›Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ĞºĞ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ€,
â€“ Ğ´ĞµĞ´Ğ¸ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸ÑĞ¸.
Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ ĞºÑĞ¿ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¼ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ò³ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ Ğ¼Ğ°Ò›ÑĞ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ò›ÑƒĞ¹Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ³Ğ° ÑÑŠÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€ Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ­Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ°Ğ²Ğ²Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾, Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆĞºĞ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¾ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ, ÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑƒÑ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¾ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¼ĞµÑ…Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ò³ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ Ğ·Ğ°Ñ€ÑƒÑ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸ Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ´ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸. Ğ¢Ğ°ÑˆĞºĞ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑÑ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ğ¡Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ€Ò›Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ±Ğ¾ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‘Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ ÑƒÑˆĞ±Ñƒ Ğ¼ÑƒÒ³Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ„Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò³Ğ°Ğ» ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° Ñ‘Ñ€Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ±ĞµÑ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‡ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ”Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ·Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ» ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ, ÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾Ò›Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° ÑˆĞµÑ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€ĞºĞ¸Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° ÑĞ½Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ°ÑŠĞ·Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸, Ğ¶ÑƒĞ¼Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½, Ğ±Ğ¾ÑˆÒ›Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ° Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›ÑÑˆĞ¸Ñˆ Ğ·Ğ°Ñ€ÑƒÑ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸, Ğ±Ñƒ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆĞºĞ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ“Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ğ» Ğ–Ğ°Ğ½ÑƒĞ± Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° Ñ‘Ñ€Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ±ĞµÑ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑŠĞºĞ¸Ğ´Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¥Ğ°Ğ²Ñ„ÑĞ¸Ğ·Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº ÑĞ¾Ò³Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ÑƒÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ²Ğ¾Ñ€ Ğ¹ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ€.
â€“ Ğ‘ÑƒĞ³ÑƒĞ½Ğ³Ğ¸ ĞºÑƒĞ½Ğ´Ğ° ĞºĞµĞ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ‘Ğ½Ğ´Ğ°ÑˆÑƒĞ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ³Ğ° Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‡ Ğ²Ğ° Ñ…Ğ°Ğ²Ñ„ÑĞ¸Ğ·Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑŠĞ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ÑĞ½Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¼ĞµÑ…Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ± ĞºÑƒÑ‡Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ± Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ¾Ò›Ğ´Ğ°,
â€“ Ğ´ĞµĞ´Ğ¸ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸.
Ğ¨Ñƒ Ğ¼Ğ°ÑŠĞ½Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°, Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¯Ğ´Ñ€Ğ¾ Ñ…Ğ°Ğ²Ñ„ÑĞ¸Ğ·Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¹ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞºÑĞ¿ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° ÑˆĞµÑ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ò³ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢ Ğ´ĞµĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸ÑÑĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›Ğ°Ğ±ÑƒĞ» Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° Ñ‡Ğ°Ò›Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¸. Ğ£ÑˆĞ±Ñƒ Ğ´ĞµĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¹ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ²Ğ° Ñ„Ğ°Ğ²Ò›ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´Ğ° Ò³Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ± Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ¼ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ò³ĞºĞ°Ğ¼ Ğ°ÑĞ¾ÑĞ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸, Ğ‘Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ³Ğ°Ğ½ ĞœĞ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ¢Ğ°ÑˆĞºĞ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸ ÑˆĞ°Ñ„ĞµĞ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ò›Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ğ» Ñ€ĞµĞ¶Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¼ÑƒĞ½Ğ¾ÑĞ¸Ğ± Ò³Ğ¸ÑÑĞ° Ğ±ÑĞ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¢Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑÑ‡ĞµĞ³Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ñ‚Ğ°Ò³Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ³Ğ° Ò›Ğ°Ñ€ÑˆĞ¸ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ ĞºÑƒÑ€Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ñˆ Ğ¼Ğ°Ò›ÑĞ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ˜Ñ‡ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ°Ñ‚ Ñ…Ğ°Ğ²Ñ„ÑĞ¸Ğ·Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñˆ, Ğ–Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞºĞ° Ò›Ğ°Ñ€ÑˆĞ¸ ĞºÑƒÑ€Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸ÑˆĞ´Ğ° Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ñ‚ÑÒ“Ñ€Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ° ĞºÑÑ€Ğ¸Ğ± Ñ‡Ğ¸Ò›Ğ¸Ñˆ, Ğ“Ğ¸Ñ‘Ò³Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞºĞ° Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ±ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ğ± Ò›Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° Ò›Ğ°Ñ€ÑˆĞ¸ ĞºÑƒÑ€Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸ÑˆĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ 2030 Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ° Ò›Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ¼ÑĞ»Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ´Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ğ± Ñ‡Ğ¸Ò›Ğ¸Ñˆ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ»Ğ¸Ñ„ Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸.
ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ â€œĞ¨Ò²Ğ¢ â€“ ĞÑ„Ò“Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½â€ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾Ò›Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ³ÑƒÑ€ÑƒÒ³Ğ¸ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›ÑĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±-Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸. ĞšĞ¾Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞºÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ² Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾Ò›Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ²Ğ° ĞÑ„Ò“Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ¶Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ¹-Ğ¸Ò›Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑĞ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ¸Ò³Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›ÑĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±-Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ»Ğ¸Ñ„Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ğ± Ñ‡Ğ¸Ò›Ğ¸Ñˆ ÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ°ÑĞ¾ÑĞ¸Ğ¹ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ„Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ±ÑĞ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ¼ĞºĞ¸Ğ½.
Ğ–Ğ°Ò³Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ¸Ò›Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑĞ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞºÑƒĞ·Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ò³Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ³Ğ¸ Ñ‚ĞµĞ½Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ†Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò³Ğ¸ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ±, ÑĞ°Ğ²Ğ´Ğ¾-Ğ¸Ò›Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑĞ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° ÑƒÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ²Ğ¾Ñ€ Ğ°Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ¾Ò›Ğ´Ğ°.
â€“ Ğ‘Ğ¸Ğ· ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¸Ò›Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑĞ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ€ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ´ĞµĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑˆĞ°ĞºĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ„Ğ´Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ·,
â€“ Ğ´ĞµĞ´Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸.
Ğ¡Ğ°Ğ²Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ¾Ğ´Ğ´Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ±-Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ñ‚ÑÒ“Ñ€Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ ÑĞ°Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ°Ñ‚ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ„Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ÑƒĞ·Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ° Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ¸Ò³Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸ÑĞ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ò›ÑĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±-Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ¾ÑĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚ĞµĞ·Ñ€Ğ¾Ò› Ğ¶Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¹ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¼ÑƒÒ³Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸ Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ´ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ˜ÑˆĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ğ± Ñ‡Ğ¸Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ-Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ° Ğ·Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¶Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ·Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ ÑĞ°Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ°Ò“Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¼Ğ°Ò›ÑĞ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¡Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ€ĞºĞ°Ğ·, Ğ­Ğ½ĞµÑ€Ğ³ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ° ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ÑĞ¾Ñ€Ñ†Ğ¸ÑƒĞ¼Ğ¸, ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¿ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ¸Ò³Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›ÑĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±-Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ÑÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ñˆ ÑƒÑ‡ÑƒĞ½ Ğ’ĞµĞ½Ñ‡ÑƒÑ€ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ¼Ò“Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ¾Ò“Ğ¸, Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ½ĞµÑ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾Ò›Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¹ÑĞ»Ğ³Ğ° Ò›ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ÑÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ñˆ ÑƒÑ‡ÑƒĞ½ ĞœĞ°Ñ…ÑÑƒÑ ÑĞ»ĞµĞºÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ» ĞºĞ°Ğ±Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€ Ò›Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€ ÑĞ½Ğ³Ğ¸ ĞºÑĞ¿ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° Ñ‚ÑƒĞ·Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ²Ğ° ĞºĞ¾Ğ¾Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸ÑĞ½Ğ¸ Ò›ÑĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±-Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ Ğ²Ğ¾ÑĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¶Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¹ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñˆ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ»Ğ¸Ñ„ Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ”Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¨Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ» â€“ Ğ–Ğ°Ğ½ÑƒĞ± Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¨Ğ°Ñ€Ò› â€“ Ò’Ğ°Ñ€Ğ± Ğ¹ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚-Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‚ ÑĞ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ò³Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ò› Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° ÑĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ñˆ, ĞœĞ°Ñ€ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ¹ ĞÑĞ¸Ñ‘ Ğ¾Ñ€Ò›Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ¤Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ ĞºÑÑ€Ñ„Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ò²Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ´ Ğ¾ĞºĞµĞ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ñ‡Ğ¸Ò›Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ½ÑƒĞ±Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¹ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¹ÑĞ»Ğ°ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ò³Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ÑÑŠÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€ Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ¸.
â€œĞ¨Ò²Ğ¢ ÑĞ³Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚ Ğ¼Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¸â€Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑˆĞ°ĞºĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ²Ğ° ÑƒĞ½Ğ¸ â€œĞ‘Ğ¸Ñ€ Ğ¼Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ½, Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€ Ğ¹ÑĞ»â€ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğº Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆĞ°Ğ±Ğ±ÑƒÑĞ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ±Ğ¾Ò“Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° ÑĞ°ÑŠĞ¹-Ò³Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ²Ğ¾Ñ„Ğ¸Ò›Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ ÑƒÑ‡ÑƒĞ½ ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ñ‚Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¶ÑƒĞ´Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸ ĞºÑÑ€ÑĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ± ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸. Ğ¯Ğ½Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ğ» Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ¾Ò›Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€, Ñ€Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ²Ğ° â€œÑÑˆĞ¸Ğ»â€ Ğ¹ÑĞ»Ğ°ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ ÑÑ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑˆĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ·Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ° Ñ‚ÑƒÑ‚ÑƒĞ²Ñ‡Ğ¸ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ†ĞµĞ¿Ñ†Ğ¸ÑĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ğ± Ñ‡Ğ¸Ò›Ğ¸Ñˆ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ»Ğ¸Ñ„ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ â€œÑÑˆĞ¸Ğ»â€ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑÑ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ ÑĞ¾Ò³Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¸Ò›Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¼ ÑĞ·Ğ³Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑĞ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ñˆ, Ò³Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ° Ğ·Ğ°Ò³Ğ°Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ³Ğ°Ğ·Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‡Ğ¸Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ½Ğ¸ ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ, ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸Ğº Ñ…Ğ°Ğ²Ñ„-Ñ…Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ°ÑˆĞ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ñˆ ÑƒÑ‡ÑƒĞ½ ÑÑƒĞ½ÑŠĞ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµĞ»Ğ»ĞµĞºÑ‚ Ñ‚ĞµÑ…Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¶Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¹ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° Ñ‚ÑƒÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ·Ğ°Ñ€ÑƒÑ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸ Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ´ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
â€“ ĞœĞ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ò›Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ´Ğ° Ñ‡ÑƒÒ›ÑƒÑ€Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ²Ğ° Ñ…Ğ°Ğ»Ò› Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑÑĞ¸ Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑƒÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞºÑƒÑ‡Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ ÑƒĞ·Ğ¾Ò› Ğ¼ÑƒĞ´Ğ´Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¸ ÑˆĞµÑ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ¼ÑƒÒ³Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ò³Ğ¸ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸,
â€“ Ğ´ĞµĞ´Ğ¸ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸.
Ğ¥Ğ°Ğ»Ò› Ğ¸Ğ¶Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ñ…Ğ°Ğ»Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ Ñ„ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñˆ, â€œĞ¨Ò²Ğ¢ ÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑĞ¸Ñ‚ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸â€ ÑˆĞµÑ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ¸Ğº Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ¾Ò“Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ½ ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¿ÑƒÑĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑÑ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñˆ, Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ¹ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ò³Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ²Ğ° Ñ‘Ñˆ Ğ¼ÑƒÑ‚Ğ°Ñ…Ğ°ÑÑĞ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ ÑÑ€Ñ‚Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆĞºĞ¸Ğ» ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ³ÑƒĞ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ°ÑˆÑƒĞ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ´Ğ° Ñ…Ğ°Ğ»Ò›Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ´Ğ° ÑÒ›Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° ĞºÑƒÑ‡Ğ»Ğ¸ Ñ‚ÑƒÑ€Ñ‚ĞºĞ¸ Ğ±ĞµÑ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑŠĞºĞ¸Ğ´Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸.
â€œĞ¡Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‘Ò³Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¹ÑĞ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸â€ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¨Ò²Ğ¢ Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ‘Ñ‚ Ñ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒÑĞ½ÑĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° Ñ‚ÑƒÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ ĞºĞ°Ğ±Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ò›Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ¸Ò³Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ğ± Ñ‡Ğ¸Ò›Ğ¸Ñˆ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ»Ğ¸Ñ„ Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸.

TITLE: Oâ€˜zbekiston Prezidenti SHHT doirasidagi koâ€˜p tomonlama hamkorlikni kengaytirishning ustuvor yoâ€˜nalishlarini koâ€˜rsatib oâ€˜tdi

Oâ€˜zbekiston Prezidenti SHHT doirasidagi koâ€˜p tomonlama hamkorlikni kengaytirishning ustuvor yoâ€˜nalishlarini koâ€˜rsatib oâ€˜tdi
01.09.2025
Oâ€˜zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti Shavkat Mirziyoyev 1-sentabr kuni Tyanszin shahrida Shanxay hamkorlik tashkiloti Davlat rahbarlari kengashining navbatdagi majlisida ishtirok etdi.
Xitoy Xalq Respublikasi Raisi Si Szinpin raisligida oâ€˜tgan tadbirda Belarus Respublikasi Prezidenti Aleksandr Lukashenko, Hindiston Respublikasi Bosh vaziri Narendra Modi, Eron Islom Respublikasi Prezidenti Masâ€™ud Pezeshkiyon, Qozogâ€˜iston Respublikasi Prezidenti Qasim-Jomart Toqayev, Qirgâ€˜iz Respublikasi Prezidenti Sadir Japarov, Pokiston Islom Respublikasi Bosh vaziri Shahboz Sharif, Rossiya Federatsiyasi Prezidenti Vladimir Putin, Tojikiston Respublikasi Prezidenti Emomali Rahmon, shuningdek, SHHT bosh kotibi Nurlan Yermekbayev va Mintaqaviy aksilterror tuzilmasi Ijroiya qoâ€˜mitasi direktori Ularbek Sharsheyev qatnashdi.
Kun tartibiga muvofiq, SHHT doirasidagi koâ€˜p tomonlama hamkorlikni yanada rivojlantirish va tashkilot faoliyatini takomillashtirish istiqbollari muhokama qilindi, mintaqaviy va xalqaro ahamiyatga molik dolzarb masalalar yuzasidan ochiq fikr almashildi.
Xitoy Raisi Si Szinpin davlatimiz rahbariga soâ€˜z berar ekan, mamlakatimiz yetakchisi va xalqini Mustaqillik kuni bilan qutladi hamda Prezident Shavkat Mirziyoyev rahbarligida Oâ€˜zbekiston yuksak surâ€™atda rivojlanib, mamlakatda hayot yaxshilangani va Xitoy tomoni bundan juda mamnunligini alohida taâ€™kidladi.
Prezidentimiz uchrashuv ishtirokchilarini qutlab, Xitoyning SHHTga raisligini yuksak baholadi va Ikkinchi jahon urushidagi Buyuk Gâ€˜alabaning 80 yilligi bilan tabrikladi, shuningdek, SHHTga aâ€™zo davlatlar delegatsiyalari rahbarlariga Oâ€˜zbekiston Respublikasining Mustaqillik kuni munosabati bilan bildirgan samimiy tabriklari va ezgu tilaklari uchun minnatdorlik izhor etdi.
Mamlakatimiz yetakchisi ushbu sammit global noaniqlik sharoitida oâ€˜tayotganini qayd etdi.
Ishonchning tizimli inqirozi, mojarolarning kengayib borayotgani, koâ€˜p tomonlama institutlarning zaiflashishi va jahon savdo tizimining parchalanishi xalqaro xavfsizlik va barqarorlik arxitekturasi asoslariga putur yetkazmoqda.
â€“ Bunday sharoitda SHHT davlatlarining bir-birini oâ€˜zaro tushunishi va birdamligi â€“ bu faqat qimmatli boylik emas, balki bizning bepoyon mintaqamizda tinchlikni saqlashning kalitidir,
â€“ dedi Oâ€˜zbekiston yetakchisi.
SHHT doirasidagi koâ€˜p tomonlama hamkorlikni yanada mustahkamlash maqsadida davlatimiz rahbari quyidagi masalalarga eâ€™tibor qaratdi.
Eng avvalo, tashkilotning samaradorligini oshirish, uning institutlari va qarorlarni amalga oshirish mexanizmlarini mustahkamlash zarurligi qayd etildi. Tashkilotni transformatsiya qilish boâ€˜yicha Samarqand sammitida boshlangan jarayonlar ushbu muhim vazifalarni hal etishga yordam berishiga ishonch bildirildi.
Davlatimiz rahbari SHHTni izchil kengaytirish, uning muloqot boâ€˜yicha sheriklari tarkibiga yangi aâ€™zolarni, jumladan, boshqa mintaqa davlatlarini qoâ€˜shish zarurligini, bu tashkilotni Global Janub mamlakatlari bilan hamkorlik platformasiga aylantirishga yordam berishini taâ€™kidladi.
Xavfsizlik sohasidagi hamkorlik SHHTning ustuvor yoâ€˜nalishlaridan biridir.
â€“ Bugungi kunda kelishilgan yondashuvlarga hamda ishonch va xavfsizlikni taâ€™minlashning yangi mexanizmlariga talab kuchayib bormoqda,
â€“ dedi Oâ€˜zbekiston Prezidenti.
Shu maâ€™noda, davlatimiz rahbari Yadro xavfsizligi yoâ€˜lida koâ€˜p tomonlama sheriklikni mustahkamlash boâ€˜yicha SHHT deklaratsiyasini qabul qilishga chaqirdi. Ushbu deklaratsiya tinchlik yoâ€˜lidagi atomni rivojlantirish va favqulodda holatlarga javob qaytarishning mustahkam asosiga aylanadi, Birlashgan Millatlar Tashkiloti shafeligidagi tarqatmaslik global rejimiga munosib hissa boâ€˜ladi.
Transchegaraviy tahdidlarga qarshi samarali kurashish maqsadida Ichki ishlar va jamoat xavfsizligi vazirlari kengashi ishini qayta tiklash, Jinoyatchilikka qarshi kurashishda hamkorlik toâ€˜gâ€˜risidagi bitimni qayta koâ€˜rib chiqish, Giyohvandlikka qaram boâ€˜lib qolishga qarshi kurashishning 2030-yilga qadar moâ€˜ljallangan dasturini ishlab chiqish taklif qilindi.
Oâ€˜zbekiston yetakchisi â€œSHHT â€“ Afgâ€˜onistonâ€ muloqot guruhi faoliyati qayta tiklanishini qoâ€˜llab-quvvatladi. Konstruktiv muloqotlarni rivojlantirish va Afgâ€˜onistondagi ijtimoiy-iqtisodiy loyihalarni qoâ€˜llab-quvvatlash boâ€˜yicha takliflarni ishlab chiqish uning asosiy vazifalaridan biri boâ€˜lishi mumkin.
Jahon iqtisodiyotida kuzatilayotgan hozirgi tendensiyalarni hisobga olib, savdo-iqtisodiy hamkorlikni kengaytirishga ustuvor ahamiyat qaratilmoqda.
â€“ Biz keng mintaqamizda iqtisodiy hamkorlikning barqaror modellarini shakllantirish tarafdorimiz,
â€“ dedi davlatimiz rahbari.
Savdoni soddalashtirish tartib-taomillari toâ€˜gâ€˜risidagi bitimni imzolash hamda mintaqaviy sanoat va infratuzilma loyihalarini moliyaviy qoâ€˜llab-quvvatlashning samarali vositalarini tezroq joriy etish muhimligi qayd etildi.
Ishonchli ishlab chiqarish-logistika zanjirlarini rivojlantirish va oâ€˜zaro sarmoyalarni ragâ€˜batlantirish maqsadida SHHT doirasida Strategik materiallar boâ€˜yicha mintaqaviy markaz, Energetika konsorsiumi, startap va innovatsion loyihalarni qoâ€˜llab-quvvatlash hamda ilgari surish uchun Venchur kompaniyalari va jamgâ€˜armalari tarmogâ€˜i, biznes boâ€˜yicha muloqotlarni yoâ€˜lga qoâ€˜yish va investitsiyalarni ilgari surish uchun Maxsus elektron portal kabi bir qator yangi koâ€˜p tomonlama tuzilmalar va kooperatsiyani qoâ€˜llab-quvvatlash vositalarini joriy etish taklif qilindi.
Davlatimiz rahbari Shimol â€“ Janub va Sharq â€“ Gâ€˜arb yoâ€˜nalishlari boâ€˜yicha transport-tranzit salohiyatini toâ€˜liq ishga solish, Markaziy Osiyo orqali Fors koâ€˜rfazi va Hind okeani portlariga chiqadigan janubiy yoâ€˜nalishdagi yoâ€˜laklarni rivojlantirishga alohida eâ€™tibor qaratdi.
â€œSHHT yagona transport makoniâ€ni shakllantirish va uni â€œBir makon, bir yoâ€˜lâ€ strategik tashabbusi bilan bogâ€˜lash boâ€˜yicha saâ€™y-harakatlarni muvofiqlashtirish uchun katta imkoniyatlar mavjudligi koâ€˜rsatib oâ€˜tildi. Yangi multimodal tarmoqlar, raqamli platformalar va â€œyashilâ€ yoâ€˜laklar yaratishni nazarda tutuvchi konsepsiyani ishlab chiqish taklif etildi.
SHHTning â€œyashilâ€ transformatsiya sohasidagi hamkorligini kengaytirish borasida iqlim oâ€˜zgarishiga moslashish, havoga zaharli gazlarni chiqarishni kamaytirish, ekologik xavf-xatarlarni bashorat qilish uchun sunâ€™iy intellekt texnologiyalarini joriy etish masalalari boâ€˜yicha mintaqaviy platformani ishga tushirish zarurligi qayd etildi.
â€“ Madaniy aloqalarni yanada chuqurlashtirish va xalq diplomatiyasi institutini kuchaytirish SHHT doirasidagi uzoq muddatli sheriklikning muhim omili hisoblanadi,
â€“ dedi Oâ€˜zbekiston Prezidenti.
Xalq ijodiyoti xalqaro festivallarini oâ€˜tkazish, â€œSHHT universitetiâ€ sheriklik tarmogâ€˜ining onlayn kampusini yaratish, innovatsion yoâ€˜nalishlar boâ€˜yicha har yili talabalar va yosh mutaxassislar oâ€˜rtasida tanlov va olimpiadalar tashkil etish gumanitar almashuvlarni rivojlantirish hamda xalqlarimizni yanada yaqinlashtirishga kuchli turtki berishi taâ€™kidlandi.
â€œSayyohlik yoâ€˜lagiâ€ va SHHT tibbiyot turizmi alyansini ishga tushirish kabi istiqbolli loyihalarni ishlab chiqish taklif qilindi.
Soâ€˜zining yakunida davlatimiz rahbari Qirgâ€˜iz Respublikasi Prezidenti Sadir Japarovni Shanxay hamkorlik tashkilotiga raislikni qabul qilgani bilan tabrikladi.
Xitoy Raisi Si Szinpin davlatimiz rahbariga ilgari surilgan muhim tashabbuslar uchun minnatdorlik bildirib, ularni birgalikda amalga oshirish muhimligini taâ€™kidladi.
Majlis yakunida hujjatlarni imzolash marosimi boâ€˜ldi. Xususan, Tyanszin deklaratsiyasi, SHHTni 2035 yilga qadar rivojlantirish strategiyasi hamda hamkorlikning turli sohalarida sheriklikni yanada mustahkamlashga qaratilgan muhim koâ€˜p tomonlama hujjatlar toâ€˜plami qabul qilindi.

Ğ’ ÑĞ¾Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ²ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚ĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ Ğ´Ğ½Ñ Ğ¾Ğ±ÑÑƒĞ¶Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‹ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ÑĞ¿ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½ĞµĞ¹ÑˆĞµĞ³Ğ¾ ÑƒĞ³Ğ»ÑƒĞ±Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ´Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° Ğ² Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ°Ñ… Ğ¨ĞĞ¡ Ğ¸ ÑĞ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑˆĞµĞ½ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ´ĞµÑÑ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸, ÑĞ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ÑĞ»ÑÑ Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºÑ€Ñ‹Ñ‚Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ Ğ¼Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸ÑĞ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ°ĞºÑ‚ÑƒĞ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑĞ°Ğ¼ Ñ€ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¸ Ğ¼ĞµĞ¶Ğ´ÑƒĞ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚ĞºĞ¸.
ĞŸĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ°Ñ ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğµ Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°, ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑĞµĞ´Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒ ĞšĞĞ  Ğ¡Ğ¸ Ğ¦Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½ÑŒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ´Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ» ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ° Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ²ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ° ĞœĞ¸Ñ€Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‘ĞµĞ²Ğ° Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ñ Ğ”Ğ½Ñ‘Ğ¼ Ğ½ĞµĞ·Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸. ĞĞ½ Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞºĞ½ÑƒĞ», Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´ Ñ€ÑƒĞºĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¼ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ° Â Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ²Ñ‹ÑĞ¾ĞºĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ñ‚ĞµĞ¼Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸, Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ½ÑŒ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ° ÑƒĞ»ÑƒÑ‡ÑˆĞ¸Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑŒ Ğ¸ ĞºĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ°Ñ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¸ÑĞºÑ€ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ´ÑƒĞµÑ‚ÑÑ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼ ÑƒÑĞ¿ĞµÑ…Ğ°Ğ¼.
ĞŸÑ€Ğ¸Ğ²ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ‚Ğ²ÑƒÑ ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ² Ğ²ÑÑ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‡Ğ¸, Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ğ´Ğ°Ğ» Ğ²Ñ‹ÑĞ¾ĞºÑƒÑ Ğ¾Ñ†ĞµĞ½ĞºÑƒ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑĞµĞ´Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑÑ‚Ğ²Ñƒ ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ Ğ² Ğ¨ĞĞ¡ Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ´Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ» Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ÑÑƒÑ‚ÑÑ‚Ğ²ÑƒÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ñ… Ñ 80-Ğ»ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸ĞµĞ¼ Ğ’ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ ĞŸĞ¾Ğ±ĞµĞ´Ñ‹ Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ’Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ½Ğµ, Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ» Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ² Ğ´ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ³Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ğ²-Ñ‡Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¨ĞĞ¡ Ğ·Ğ° Ñ‚ĞµĞ¿Ğ»Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ´Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑĞºÑ€ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ² ÑĞ²ÑĞ·Ğ¸ Ñ Ğ”Ğ½ĞµĞ¼ Ğ½ĞµĞ·Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½.
Ğ›Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµÑ€ Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ¹ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞºĞ½ÑƒĞ», Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ½ĞµÑˆĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ² ÑƒÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸ÑÑ… Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ½ĞµĞ¾Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸.
Ğ¡Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¼Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ ĞºÑ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ñ, ÑÑĞºĞ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ„Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ², Ğ¾ÑĞ»Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑƒÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¸ Ñ„Ñ€Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑĞ¸ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¼Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‚ Ğ¾ÑĞ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ¼ĞµĞ¶Ğ´ÑƒĞ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ°Ñ€Ñ…Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ñ‹ Ğ±ĞµĞ·Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ°ÑĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸.

Ğ’ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑÑ‚Ğµ Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ²Ğ°Ğ» Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ”ĞµĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¨ĞĞ¡ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ÑƒĞºÑ€ĞµĞ¿Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ½ĞµÑ€ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ¸Ğ¼Ñ ÑĞ´ĞµÑ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ±ĞµĞ·Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ°ÑĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ñ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¾ÑĞ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ° Ğ¸ Ñ€ĞµĞ°Ğ³Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ½Ğ° Ñ‡Ñ€ĞµĞ·Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ‡Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ ÑĞ¸Ñ‚ÑƒĞ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸, Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ²ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ² Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ñ€ĞµĞ¶Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ½ĞµÑ€Ğ°ÑĞ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´ ÑĞ³Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞÑ€Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ ĞĞ±ÑŠĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‘Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… ĞĞ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¹.
Ğ”Ğ»Ñ ÑÑ„Ñ„ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ÑĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑĞ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ ÑƒĞ³Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñƒ Ğ¡Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ‰Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ²Ğ½ÑƒÑ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ´ĞµĞ» Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‰ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ±ĞµĞ·Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ°ÑĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸, Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¡Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¾ ÑĞ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ´Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğµ Ğ² Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€ÑŒĞ±Ğµ Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒÑ, Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ĞŸÑ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¼Ñƒ Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€ÑŒĞ±Ñ‹ Ñ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ€ĞºĞ¾Ğ·Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒÑ Ğ´Ğ¾ 2030 Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°.
Ğ›Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµÑ€ Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ» Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ‹ ĞšĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒĞ¿Ğ¿Ñ‹ Â«Ğ¨ĞĞ¡-ĞÑ„Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Â», Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ¾ÑĞ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ·Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ñ‡ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ»Ğ° Ğ±Ñ‹ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºĞ° Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞºÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶ĞºĞµ ÑĞ¾Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾-ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ² ĞÑ„Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğµ.
ĞĞ° Ñ„Ğ¾Ğ½Ğµ Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑƒÑ‰Ğ¸Ñ… Ñ‚ĞµĞ½Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ² Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸ĞºĞµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑˆĞ¸Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾-ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ´Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°.

Ğ’ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑÑ‚Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¼ĞµÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ° Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑĞ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¡Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¾Ğ± ÑƒĞ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‰ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ†ĞµĞ´ÑƒÑ€ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ¸ ÑĞºĞ¾Ñ€ĞµĞ¹ÑˆĞµĞµ Ğ²Ğ½ĞµĞ´Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ ÑÑ„Ñ„ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ² Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ½ÑĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶ĞºĞ¸ Ñ€ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñ‹ÑˆĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ„Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞºÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ².
Ğ’ Ñ†ĞµĞ»ÑÑ… Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ´ĞµĞ¶Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾-Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ñ†ĞµĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞº Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ²Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¾ ÑĞ¾Ğ·Ğ´Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ² Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ°Ñ… Ğ¨ĞĞ¡ Ñ€ÑĞ´ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‰Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¾Ğº Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶ĞºĞ¸ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¾Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸, Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¸Ñ… ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ñ†ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ñ€ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ĞºÑ€Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¼ Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼, Ğ­Ğ½ĞµÑ€Ğ³ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ÑĞ¾Ñ€Ñ†Ğ¸ÑƒĞ¼, Ğ¡ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ñ‡ÑƒÑ€Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¸ Ñ„Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶ĞºĞ¸ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¿ Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ², Ğ¡Ğ¿ĞµÑ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ ÑĞ»ĞµĞºÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ» Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ½ĞµÑ-ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¹, Ñ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸ĞµĞ¼ Ñ€ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ².
Ğ“Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ» Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ½Ğ° Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞºÑ€Ñ‹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğµ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¾-Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞµĞ½Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ÑĞ¼ Ğ¡ĞµĞ²ĞµÑ€-Ğ®Ğ³ Ğ¸ Ğ’Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğº-Ğ—Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ´, Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğµ ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ² ÑĞ¶Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ»ĞµĞ³Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ñ… Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ· Ğ¦ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½ÑƒÑ ĞĞ·Ğ¸Ñ, Ñ Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğº Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¼ ĞŸĞµÑ€ÑĞ¸Ğ´ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¸ Ğ˜Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¾ĞºĞµĞ°Ğ½Ğ°.

ĞŸĞ¾ ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¼, Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‰Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»Ñ‡Ğ¾Ğº Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ Ğ³ÑƒĞ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ° Ğ¸ ĞµÑ‰Ğµ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒÑˆĞµĞ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ñ… Ğ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ ĞœĞµĞ¶Ğ´ÑƒĞ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ñ„ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ»Ñ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°, ÑĞ¾Ğ·Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ½-ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¿ÑƒÑĞ° Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ½ĞµÑ€ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ ÑĞµÑ‚Ğ¸ Â«Ğ£Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑĞ¸Ñ‚ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¨ĞĞ¡Â», Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ ĞµĞ¶ĞµĞ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ĞºÑƒÑ€ÑĞ¾Ğ²
Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ´ ÑÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ‹Ñ… ÑĞ¿ĞµÑ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸ÑĞ¼.

Ğ’ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑˆĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ´Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ» ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ° ĞšÑ‹Ñ€Ğ³Ñ‹Ğ·ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¡Ğ°Ğ´Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ° Ğ–Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ° Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ĞµĞ¼ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑĞµĞ´Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° Ğ² Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ½Ñ…Ğ°Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ ÑĞ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ´Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°.
ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑĞµĞ´Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒ ĞšĞĞ  Ğ¡Ğ¸ Ğ¦Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½ÑŒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ» Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğµ Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ·Ğ° Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ´Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ½ÑƒÑ‚Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ² Ğ²Ñ‹ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞºĞ½ÑƒĞ» Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¸Ñ… ÑĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ€ĞµĞ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸.

Ğ’Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ! Ğ•ÑĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ’Ñ‹ Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ¾ÑˆĞ¸Ğ±ĞºÑƒ Ğ² Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑÑ‚Ğµ, Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ´ĞµĞ»Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ ĞµÑ‘ Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ctrl+Enter Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑƒĞ²ĞµĞ´Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸

TITLE: Ğ¥Ğ¥Ğ  Ğ Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ°Ğ¹Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ»Ğ¸ Ò“Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±Ğ°ÑĞ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ñ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸

Ğ¥Ğ¥Ğ  Ğ Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ°Ğ¹Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ»Ğ¸ Ò“Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±Ğ°ÑĞ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ñ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸
27.10.2021
ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ²ĞºĞ°Ñ‚ ĞœĞ¸Ñ€Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‘ĞµĞ² 27 Ğ¾ĞºÑ‚ÑĞ±Ñ€ÑŒ ĞºÑƒĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¥Ğ°Ğ»Ò› Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ Ğ Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ Ğ¡Ğ¸ Ğ¦Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½ÑŒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ĞµÑ„Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ¾Ñ€Ò›Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾Ò›Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¡ÑƒÒ³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‚ Ğ°Ğ²Ğ²Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¥Ğ  Ğ Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° ÑĞ°Ğ¹Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¼ÑƒĞ²Ğ°Ñ„Ñ„Ğ°Ò›Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ»Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° ÑƒĞ½Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ»Ğ¸ Ò“Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±Ğ°Ğ³Ğ° ÑÑ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ò›ÑƒÑ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸.
ĞĞ²Ğ¾Ğ· Ğ±ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ÑĞ½Ğ³Ğ¸ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ò›Ò›Ğ¸Ñ‘Ñ‚ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ³Ğ¸ÑÑĞ¸ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ´Ğ° Ñ…Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ¹ ÑˆĞµÑ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ ÑĞ·Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ñ„Ğ°Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¸ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ò³ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ³Ğ° Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆÒ›Ğ¸ ÑĞ¸Ñ‘ÑĞ°Ñ‚ Ñ…Ğ°Ğ»Ò› Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³ Ò›ÑĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±-Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ½Ğ° Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€ Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ¸Ñˆ ÑÑ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ò³Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ÑŠĞºĞ¸Ğ´Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ´ Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ½Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ²Ğ°Ñ„Ñ„Ğ°Ò›Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€, Ğ´ÑÑÑ‚ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ñ…Ğ°Ğ»Ò›Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° ÑÑĞ° Ñ„Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ²Ğ° Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ°Ò› Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ”Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚ Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½-Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ò³Ğ°Ñ€ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğº ÑˆĞµÑ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¼ÑƒĞ½Ğ¾ÑĞ°Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¼ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ò³ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ·Ğ°Ñ€Ğ± Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞºÑÑ€Ğ¸Ğ± Ñ‡Ğ¸Ò›Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€.
Ğ˜ÑˆĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ³Ğ° Ğ°ÑĞ¾ÑĞ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾Ò›Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ±ÑƒĞ³ÑƒĞ½Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°ÑĞ¸, Ğ¶Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ» Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ»ÑŒ Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾Ò›Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ° ÑÑ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ ĞºĞµĞ»Ğ¸ÑˆÑƒĞ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¼ÑƒĞ²Ğ¾Ñ„Ğ¸Ò› Ğ¸ĞºĞºĞ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ò›Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ·Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½ÑƒĞ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ñ‚Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ½ÑƒĞ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ´ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¡Ğ¸Ñ‘ÑĞ¸Ğ¹ ÑĞ¾Ò³Ğ°Ğ´Ğ° ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ â€œÑĞ³Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑĞ¸Ñ‘ÑĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¸â€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ´Ğ° â€œÑƒÑ‡ Ñ‘Ğ²ÑƒĞ· ĞºÑƒÑ‡â€ â€“ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼, ÑĞºÑÑ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ¼Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼ Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ³Ğ° Ò›Ğ°Ñ€ÑˆĞ¸ Ò›Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŠĞ¸Ğ¹ ĞºÑƒÑ€Ğ°ÑˆĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ò›ÑĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±-Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ‘ÑƒĞ½Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆÒ›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸, ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ€ÑƒÑ Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´ĞµĞ¼Ğ¸ÑÑĞ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ò›Ğ°Ñ€ÑˆĞ¸ ĞºÑƒÑ€Ğ°ÑˆĞ´Ğ° ĞºÑÑ€ÑĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ñ‚Ğ° Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ñ‘Ñ€Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¼, ÑˆÑƒ Ğ¶ÑƒĞ¼Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ²Ğ°ĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ ÑĞ· Ğ²Ğ°Ò›Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞµÑ‚ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ± Ğ±ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° ÑƒĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ³Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ´Ğ° Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ğ± Ñ‡Ğ¸Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¹ÑĞ»Ğ³Ğ° Ò›ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑƒÑ‡ÑƒĞ½ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ Ğ°Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¡Ğ¸ Ğ¦Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½ÑŒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ½, ÑĞ· Ğ½Ğ°Ğ²Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°, Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ÑÑƒĞ²ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸, Ğ¼ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ò³ÑƒĞ´ÑƒĞ´Ğ¸Ğ¹ ÑÑ…Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸, ÑˆÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³Ğ´ĞµĞº, Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ° Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¾ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¸Ğ¶Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ¹-Ğ¸Ò›Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑĞ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¹ ÑĞ½Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ´Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŠĞ¸Ğ¹ Ò›ÑĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±-Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑŠĞºĞ¸Ğ´Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¡Ğ°Ğ²Ğ´Ğ¾-Ğ¸Ò›Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑĞ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¹ ÑĞ¾Ò³Ğ°Ğ´Ğ° ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ±Ğ¾ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñˆ ÑĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ ÑÑĞ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ´ ÑÑ‚Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€. Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ğ·Ğ°Ñ€ÑƒÑ€ Ğ¼Ğ°Ò³ÑÑƒĞ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€, ÑĞ½Ğ³ Ğ°Ğ²Ğ²Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾ Ò›Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ¾Ò› Ñ…ÑĞ¶Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ÑÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¼Ğ°Ò›ÑĞ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¶Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ» Ğ½Ğ¾ÑĞ±Ñ€ÑŒ Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ½Ñ…Ğ°Ğ¹ ÑˆĞ°Ò³Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ‚ÑÑ€Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ¸ Ğ˜Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ñ…Ğ°Ğ»Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ ĞºÑÑ€Ğ³Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¾Ğ» Ğ¸ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğº ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ³Ğ° ĞºĞµĞ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ± Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ‘ĞµÑˆ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¡Ğ°Ğ²Ğ´Ğ¾-Ğ¸Ò›Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑĞ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ´Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‘Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ, ÑƒĞ½Ğ³Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğº Ğ°Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ³Ğ° ÑĞ³Ğ°, ÑˆÑƒ Ğ¶ÑƒĞ¼Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€, ÑÑƒĞ½ÑŠĞ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµĞ»Ğ»ĞµĞºÑ‚, Ñ€Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ¸ Ñ‚ĞµÑ…Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ²Ğ° ÑĞ»ĞµĞºÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½ Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¶Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ ÑĞ¾Ò³Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ¸Ò³Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞºĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ°Ğ»Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ò³Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ÑÑŠÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€ Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
ĞšĞ°Ğ¼Ğ±Ğ°Ò“Ğ°Ğ»Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¶Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ° Ğ²Ğ° Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ñˆ Ğ¼ÑƒÒ³Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ¹ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ñˆ ÑĞ¸Ñ„Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ±ĞµĞ»Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ± Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸. Ğ¨Ñƒ Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¸ĞºĞºĞ¸ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ²Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¼ĞµĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´ÑƒĞ¼Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¾ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ò³Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ÑÑŠÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€ Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ¾Ò›Ğ´Ğ°.
ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ±Ğ¾Ò“Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ²Ğ° â€œĞ‘Ğ¸Ñ€ Ğ¼Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ½, Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€ Ğ¹ÑĞ»â€ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆĞ°Ğ±Ğ±ÑƒÑĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ•Ğ²Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¾ÑĞ¸Ñ‘ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑÒ›Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŠĞ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ¹ÑĞ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑˆĞ°ĞºĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚ Ğ¹ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ·Ğ°Ñ€ÑƒÑ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑŠĞºĞ¸Ğ´Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€.
Ğ¤Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ²Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ÑŠĞ»Ğ¸Ğ¼, ÑĞ¾Ò“Ğ»Ğ¸Ò›Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ°Ò›Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ°Ò³Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ¼Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ, ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚, Ñ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼, Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ±Ğ¾ÑˆÒ›Ğ° Ğ¹ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ° Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ ÑƒÑ‡ÑƒĞ½ Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¶ÑƒĞ´ ÑĞºĞ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ´ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ²ĞºĞ°Ñ‚ ĞœĞ¸Ñ€Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‘ĞµĞ² Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ°ÑĞ±Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ´ÑÑÑ‚ Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ…Ğ°Ğ»Ò›Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° 2022 Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ° ĞŸĞµĞºĞ¸Ğ½ ÑˆĞ°Ò³Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ò›Ğ¸ÑˆĞºĞ¸ ĞĞ»Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ¸Ñ ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ²Ğ°Ñ„Ñ„Ğ°Ò›Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ»Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ–Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ» ÑĞºÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ° ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½-Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ò³ÑƒĞºÑƒĞ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ Ò›ÑĞ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ²Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ò“Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñˆ, ÑˆÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³Ğ´ĞµĞº, Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¼ÑƒĞ½Ğ¾ÑĞ°Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ ÑÑ€Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ 30 Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ò›ÑÑˆĞ¼Ğ° Ğ´Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‘Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ³Ğ° ĞºĞµĞ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ± Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸.
ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¥Ğ  Ğ Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ Ñ…Ğ°Ğ»Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ ĞºÑƒĞ½ Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ¸ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ÑĞ·Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ Ñ„Ğ¸ĞºÑ€ Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ°ÑˆĞ´Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€.
Ğ”Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ‘Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ³Ğ°Ğ½ ĞœĞ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ¢Ğ°ÑˆĞºĞ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ‘Ğ¾Ñˆ ĞÑÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ±Ğ»ĞµÑÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ÑÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ“Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ğ» Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ò›Ò›Ğ¸Ñ‘Ñ‚ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆĞ°Ğ±Ğ±ÑƒÑĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›ÑĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±-Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ‘ÑƒĞ½Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆÒ›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸, Ğ–Ğ°Ò³Ğ¾Ğ½ ÑĞ¾Ò“Ğ»Ğ¸Ò›Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ°Ò›Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆĞºĞ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ‘ĞœĞ¢Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ±Ğ¾ÑˆÒ›Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑƒÑ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ ÑÒ›Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾Ò›Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¼ ÑÑ‚Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° ĞºĞµĞ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ± Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ½Ñ…Ğ°Ğ¹ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆĞºĞ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ò› Ò›ÑĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±-Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸.

XXR Raisi Oâ€˜zbekiston Prezidentini saylovdagi ishonchli gâ€˜alabasi bilan tabrikladi
27.10.2021
Oâ€˜zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti Shavkat Mirziyoyev 27-oktabr kuni Xitoy Xalq Respublikasi Raisi Si Szinpin bilan telefon orqali muloqot qildi.
Suhbat avvalida XXR Raisi davlatimiz rahbarini Oâ€˜zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidentligiga saylov muvaffaqiyatli oâ€˜tkazilgani va unda ishonchli gâ€˜alabaga erishilgani bilan samimiy qutladi.
Ovoz berish natijalari yangi Oâ€˜zbekistonning taraqqiyot strategiyasi hamda xorijiy sheriklar bilan oâ€˜zaro manfaatli hamkorlikni mustahkamlashga qaratilgan tashqi siyosat xalq tomonidan keng qoâ€˜llab-quvvatlanayotganini yana bir bor namoyish etgani alohida taâ€™kidlandi.
Xitoy Raisi Oâ€˜zbekiston yetakchisiga omad va yangi muvaffaqiyatlar, doâ€˜st Oâ€˜zbekiston xalqiga esa farovonlik va ravnaq tiladi.
Davlat rahbarlari Oâ€˜zbekiston-Xitoy har tomonlama strategik sheriklik munosabatlarini yanada mustahkamlashning dolzarb masalalarini koâ€˜rib chiqdilar.
Ishonchga asoslangan muloqotning bugungi darajasi, joriy yil aprel oyida oâ€˜tgan muloqotlarda erishilgan kelishuvlarga muvofiq ikki tomonlama aloqalar rivojlanayotgani va oâ€˜zaro almashinuvlar faollashgani katta mamnuniyat bilan qayd etildi.
Siyosiy sohada Oâ€˜zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti â€œyagona Xitoy siyosatiâ€ni hamda â€œuch yovuz kuchâ€ â€“ terrorizm, ekstremizm va separatizmga qarshi qatâ€™iy kurashni doimiy qoâ€˜llab-quvvatlashini bildirdi.
Bundan tashqari, koronavirus pandemiyasiga qarshi kurashda koâ€˜rsatilayotgan katta amaliy yordam, shu jumladan vaksinalar oâ€˜z vaqtida yetkazib berilayotgani va ularni birgalikda ishlab chiqarish yoâ€˜lga qoâ€˜yilgani uchun minnatdorlik bildirildi.
Rais Si Szinpin, oâ€˜z navbatida, Xitoy Oâ€˜zbekistonning suvereniteti, mustaqilligi va hududiy yaxlitligini, shuningdek, mamlakatda amalga oshirilayotgan ijtimoiy-iqtisodiy yangilanishlar dasturini qatâ€™iy qoâ€˜llab-quvvatlashini taâ€™kidladi.
Savdo-iqtisodiy sohada yetakchilar tovar ayirboshlash sezilarli oâ€˜sayotganini qayd etdilar. Xitoy bozoriga zarur mahsulotlar, eng avvalo qishloq xoâ€˜jaligi tovarlarini ilgari surish maqsadida joriy yil noyabr oyida Shanxay shahrida oâ€˜tadigan toâ€˜rtinchi Import tovarlar xalqaro koâ€˜rgazmasida Oâ€˜zbekiston faol ishtirok etishiga kelishib olindi.
Besh yillik Savdo-iqtisodiy hamkorlik dasturini tayyorlash, unga strategik ahamiyatga ega, shu jumladan innovatsiyalar, sunâ€™iy intellekt, raqamli texnologiyalar va elektron tijorat sohalari boâ€˜yicha loyihalarni kiritish masalasiga alohida eâ€™tibor qaratildi.
Kambagâ€˜allikni kamaytirish masalalarida tajriba va bilim almashish muhim yoâ€˜nalish sifatida belgilab olindi. Shu oyda ikki mamlakatning vakolatli idoralari tomonidan imzolangan memorandumni amalga oshirishga alohida eâ€™tibor qaratilmoqda.
Oâ€˜zbekiston va Xitoy rahbarlari Xitoyni mintaqamiz bilan bogâ€˜laydigan va â€œBir makon, bir yoâ€˜lâ€ tashabbusi doirasida Yevroosiyo transqitâ€™aviy tranzit yoâ€˜lagini shakllantiradigan samarali transport yoâ€˜nalishlarini rivojlantirish zarurligini taâ€™kidladilar.
Fan va taâ€™lim, sogâ€˜liqni saqlash va aholini emlash, sport, turizm, madaniyat va boshqa yoâ€˜nalishlarda hamkorlikni kengaytirish uchun imkoniyatlar mavjud ekani qayd etildi.
Prezident Shavkat Mirziyoyev hamkasbi va doâ€˜st Xitoy xalqiga 2022-yilda Pekin shahrida oâ€˜tkaziladigan qishki Olimpiya oâ€˜yinlari muvaffaqiyatli oâ€˜tkazilishini tiladi.
Joriy yil yakunigacha Oâ€˜zbekiston-Xitoy hukumatlararo qoâ€˜mitasining navbatdagi yigâ€˜ilishini oâ€˜tkazish, shuningdek, diplomatik munosabatlar oâ€˜rnatilganining 30 yilligini nishonlash boâ€˜yicha qoâ€˜shma dasturni tayyorlashga kelishib olindi.
Oâ€˜zbekiston Prezidenti va XXR Raisi xalqaro kun tartibi hamda mintaqaviy hamkorlik masalalari yuzasidan ham fikr almashdilar.
Davlatimiz rahbari Xitoy yetakchisi tomonidan Birlashgan Millatlar Tashkiloti Bosh Assambleyasida ilgari surilgan Global taraqqiyot tashabbusini qoâ€˜llab-quvvatladi.
Bundan tashqari, Jahon sogâ€˜liqni saqlash tashkiloti va BMTning boshqa institutlari doirasidagi yaqin muloqotni davom ettirishga kelishib olindi.
Xitoy yetakchisi mamlakatimizning Shanxay hamkorlik tashkilotidagi raisligini toâ€˜liq qoâ€˜llab-quvvatladi.
Davlat rahbarlari Afgâ€˜onistonda mustahkam tinchlik oâ€˜rnatish va iqtisodiy taraqqiyotga erishish masalalarini ham koâ€˜rib chiqdilar. Afgâ€˜on xalqiga koâ€˜maklashish maqsadida ShHT va boshqa formatlar doirasidagi muloqotni davom ettirish haqida kelishuvga erishildi.
Muloqot yakunida Prezident Shavkat Mirziyoyev va Rais Si Szinpin doâ€˜st xalqlarimiz va mamlakatlarimizga tinchlik-osoyishtalik, farovonlik va ravnaq tiladilar.
Suhbat har doimgidek ochiqlik, ishonch va doâ€˜stlik ruhida oâ€˜tdi.

ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑĞµĞ´Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒ ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ Ğ¸ÑĞºÑ€ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ»Ğ°Ğ» ÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ¸ Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ… ÑƒÑĞ¿ĞµÑ…Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ñƒ Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°, Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ†Ğ²ĞµÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ ÑƒĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ñƒ.
Ğ“Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ğ² Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ°ĞºÑ‚ÑƒĞ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‹ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½ĞµĞ¹ÑˆĞµĞ³Ğ¾ ÑƒĞºÑ€ĞµĞ¿Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ ÑƒĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºÑĞºĞ¾-ĞºĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ÑˆĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ²ÑĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ½ĞµÑ€ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°.
Ğ¡ Ğ³Ğ»ÑƒĞ±Ğ¾ĞºĞ¸Ğ¼ ÑƒĞ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¸ĞµĞ¼ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¼ĞµÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ñ‹ Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ½ĞµÑˆĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ ÑƒÑ€Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµĞ½ÑŒ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ°, Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ´Ğ²ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ… ÑĞ²ÑĞ·ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¸ Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ğ²Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ² ÑĞ¾Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ²ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ñ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑĞ¼Ğ¸, Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ½ÑƒÑ‚Ñ‹Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ² Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğµ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ½Ğ° Ğ²Ñ‹ÑÑˆĞµĞ¼ ÑƒÑ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ½Ğµ Ğ² Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ»Ğµ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°.
Ğ’ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ ÑÑ„ĞµÑ€Ğµ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ» Ğ½ĞµĞ¸Ğ·Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ½ÑƒÑ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶ĞºÑƒ Â«Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ ĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°ÑÂ» Ğ¸ Ñ€ĞµÑˆĞ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€ÑŒĞ±Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ² Â«Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ… ÑĞ¸Ğ» Ğ·Ğ»Ğ°Â» â€“ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ°, ÑĞºÑÑ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ¼Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ° Ğ¸ ÑĞµĞ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ°.
ĞšÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾, Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ ĞºĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğµ Ğ·Ğ° Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒÑˆÑƒÑ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºÑƒÑ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‰ÑŒ Ğ² Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ÑĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´ĞµĞ¼Ğ¸Ğ¸ ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ€ÑƒÑĞ°, Ğ²ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡Ğ°Ñ ÑĞ²Ğ¾ĞµĞ²Ñ€ĞµĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¸ ÑĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ°ĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ğ½.
Ğ’ ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ñ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑŒ, ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑĞµĞ´Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒ Ğ¡Ğ¸ Ğ¦Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½ÑŒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞºĞ½ÑƒĞ», Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹ Ñ‚Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ğ´Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ ÑÑƒĞ²ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµÑ‚, Ğ½ĞµĞ·Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¸ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½ÑƒÑ Ñ†ĞµĞ»Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°, Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¾ÑÑƒÑ‰ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ»ÑĞµĞ¼ÑƒÑ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¼Ñƒ ÑĞ¾Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾-ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ² ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğµ.
Ğ’ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾-ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ ÑÑ„ĞµÑ€Ğµ Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ñ‹ Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ Ğ¿Ğ¾ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ¹ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ°. Ğ”Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¾Ğº Ğ²Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ±Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ÑƒĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ° ĞºĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹ Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ½Ğ¾Ğº, Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ¶Ğ´Ğµ Ğ²ÑĞµĞ³Ğ¾ ÑĞµĞ»ÑŒÑĞºĞ¾Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ·ÑĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ², Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ½ÑƒÑ‚Ğ° Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¾Ğ± Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ğ² Ñ‡ĞµÑ‚Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞœĞµĞ¶Ğ´ÑƒĞ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ²Ñ‹ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²ĞºĞµ Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ², ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ñ ÑĞ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑÑ Ğ² Ğ½Ğ¾ÑĞ±Ñ€Ğµ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ° Ğ² Ğ³Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ĞµÂ Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ½Ñ…Ğ°Ğµ.
ĞÑĞ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ ÑƒĞ´ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ³Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞµ Ğ¿ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»ĞµÑ‚Ğ½ĞµĞ¹ ĞŸÑ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¼Ñ‹ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾-ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ´Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°, Ñ Ğ²ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸ĞµĞ¼ Ğ² Ğ½ĞµĞµ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ², Ğ² Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ñ‡Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğµ Ğ² ÑÑ„ĞµÑ€Ğµ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¹, Ğ¸ÑĞºÑƒÑÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµĞ»Ğ»ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ°, Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ„Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ… Ñ‚ĞµÑ…Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¸ ÑĞ»ĞµĞºÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¼ĞµÑ€Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸.
Ğ’ ĞºĞ°Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğµ ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡ĞµĞ²Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ²Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ´ĞµĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½ Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ‹Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ¸ Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑĞ¼Ğ¸ Ğ² Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑĞ°Ñ… ÑĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ±ĞµĞ´Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸. Ğ’Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ Ñ€ĞµĞ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ ĞœĞµĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´ÑƒĞ¼Ğ°, Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑĞ°Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑƒĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ²ĞµĞ´Ğ¾Ğ¼ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ²ÑƒÑ… ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ² ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ¼ĞµÑÑÑ†Ğµ.
Ğ“Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¸ ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ Ğ²Ñ‹ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ·Ğ° Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğµ ÑĞ¸ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¼Ñ‹ ÑÑ„Ñ„ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ€ÑˆÑ€ÑƒÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ², ÑĞ²ÑĞ·Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ñ… ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹ Ñ Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ¼ Ñ€ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ¸ Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€ÑƒÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ•Ğ²Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ¾Ñ€ Ğ² Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ°Ñ… Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ñ‹ Â«ĞŸĞ¾ÑÑĞ° Ğ¸ Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‚Ğ¸Â».
ĞÑ‚Ğ¼ĞµÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ñ‹ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑˆĞ¸Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ ÑĞ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ´Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° Ğ² ÑÑ„ĞµÑ€Ğµ Ğ½Ğ°ÑƒĞºĞ¸ Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ, Ğ·Ğ´Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¾Ñ…Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ°ĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ°ÑĞµĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ, ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ°, Ñ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ°, ĞºÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ñ‹ Ğ¸ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸ÑÑ….
ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ²ĞºĞ°Ñ‚ ĞœĞ¸Ñ€Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‘ĞµĞ² Ğ¸ÑĞºÑ€ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ»Ğ°Ğ» ÑĞ²Ğ¾ĞµĞ¼Ñƒ ĞºĞ¾Ğ»Ğ»ĞµĞ³Ğµ Ğ¸ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ñƒ ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ ÑƒÑĞ¿ĞµÑˆĞ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ… ĞĞ»Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ¸Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€ Ğ² ĞŸĞµĞºĞ¸Ğ½Ğµ Ğ² 2022 Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ñƒ.
Ğ¡Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°ÑĞ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ°ÑĞµĞ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ ÑƒĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºÑĞºĞ¾-ĞºĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ĞœĞµĞ¶Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµÑ‚Ğ° Ğ´Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ†Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°, Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ³Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞ° ÑĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¼Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ 30-Ğ»ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ÑˆĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¹.
ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ Ğ£Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑĞµĞ´Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒ ĞšĞĞ  Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ÑĞ»Ğ¸ÑÑŒ Ğ¼Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸ÑĞ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ¼ĞµĞ¶Ğ´ÑƒĞ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚ĞºĞµ Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑĞ°Ğ¼ Ñ€ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ²Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ´ĞµĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ.
Ğ“Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ» Ğ˜Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ñƒ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ, Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ´Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ½ÑƒÑ‚ÑƒÑ Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¼ ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‰Ğ°Ğ´ĞºĞµ Ğ“ĞµĞ½ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞÑÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ±Ğ»ĞµĞ¸ ĞÑ€Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ ĞĞ±ÑŠĞµĞ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‘Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… ĞĞ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¹.
ĞšÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾, ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ñ‹ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ÑÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¶Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ñ‚ĞµÑĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³ Ğ² Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ°Ñ… Ğ´ĞµÑÑ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ’ÑĞµĞ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ·Ğ´Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¾Ñ…Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑƒÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ² ĞĞĞ.
Ğ›Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµÑ€ ĞšĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ Ğ²Ñ‹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ» Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½ÑƒÑ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶ĞºÑƒ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ÑĞµĞ´Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑÑ‚Ğ²Ñƒ Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ¹ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‹ Ğ² Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ½Ñ…Ğ°Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ ÑĞ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ´Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°.
Ğ“Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ³Ğ¾ÑÑƒĞ´Ğ°Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ğ² Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‹ ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ° Ğ¸ ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ ĞÑ„Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°. Ğ”Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ÑÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¶Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³ Ğ² Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ°Ñ… Ğ¨ĞĞ¡ Ğ¸ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ñ… Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ² Ñ Ñ†ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑ Ğ¾ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ ÑĞ¾Ğ´ĞµĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ Ğ°Ñ„Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ñƒ.
Ğ’ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑˆĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ° ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ²ĞºĞ°Ñ‚ ĞœĞ¸Ñ€Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‘ĞµĞ² Ğ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑĞµĞ´Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒ Ğ¡Ğ¸ Ğ¦Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½ÑŒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ½ Ñ‚ĞµĞ¿Ğ»Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ÑĞ»Ğ¸ÑÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑĞ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°, Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ñ€ĞµÑÑĞ° Ğ´Ğ²ÑƒĞ¼ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ½Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼.

ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ²ĞºĞ°Ñ‚ ĞœĞ¸Ñ€Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‘ĞµĞ² Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¥Ğ°Ğ»Ò› Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ Ğ Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ Ğ¡Ğ¸ Ğ¦Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½ÑŒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ĞŸĞµĞºĞ¸Ğ½ ÑˆĞ°Ò³Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ±ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ğ± ÑÑ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ·Ğ¾ĞºĞ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ÑĞºÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¸ĞºĞºĞ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° Ò³ÑƒĞ¶Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ñˆ Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ±ÑĞ»Ğ´Ğ¸. Ğ¨Ñƒ Ğ¶ÑƒĞ¼Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½:

â€“ ĞœĞ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ€ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ·Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑŠÑĞ¸Ñ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñˆ Ñ‚ÑÒ“Ñ€Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼;

Ğ‘ÑƒĞ½Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆÒ›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸, Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆÑ€Ğ¸Ñ„ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ò›ÑƒĞ¹Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ ĞºĞµĞ»Ğ¸ÑˆÑƒĞ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ·Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸:

Xitoy bilan salmoqli hujjatlar toâ€˜plami qabul qilindi
02.09.2025
Oâ€˜zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti Shavkat Mirziyoyev va Xitoy Xalq Respublikasi Raisi Si Szinpinning Pekin shahrida boâ€˜lib oâ€˜tgan muzokaralari yakunida imzolangan ikki tomonlama hujjatlarni almashish marosimi boâ€˜ldi. Shu jumladan:
â€“ â€œOâ€˜zbekiston â€“ 2030â€ strategiyasi va â€œBir makon, bir yoâ€˜lâ€ tashabbusini oâ€˜zaro bogâ€˜lash boâ€˜yicha hamkorlik dasturi;
â€“ Madaniyat markazlarini oâ€˜zaro taâ€™sis etish toâ€˜gâ€˜risida bitim;
â€“ Tibbiy xizmatlar sohasida hamkorlik toâ€˜gâ€˜risida bitim.
Bundan tashqari, tashrif doirasida quyidagi kelishuvlar ham imzolandi:
â€“ Oâ€˜zbekistonga zemsnaryadlar (texnik kema) berish loyihasining ikkinchi bosqichini loyihalashtirish boâ€˜yicha;
â€“ texnik-iqtisodiy hamkorlik toâ€˜gâ€˜risida;
â€“ muvofiqlikni baholash sohasidagi hamkorlik toâ€˜gâ€˜risida;
â€“ Oâ€˜zbekistondan Xitoyga qovun va bodom eksport qilishda fitosanitariya talablari toâ€˜gâ€˜risida;
â€“ kosmik fanlar, texnologiyalar va kosmik faoliyat natijalaridan tinchlik maqsadlarida foydalanishda hamkorlik qilish toâ€˜gâ€˜risida;
â€“ raqobat siyosati sohasidagi hamkorlik toâ€˜gâ€˜risida;
â€“ inson resurslarini rivojlantirish sohasida hamkorlikni mustahkamlash boâ€˜yicha;
â€“ raqamli iqtisodiyot sohasidagi hamkorlikni mustahkamlash boâ€˜yicha;
â€“ Samarqand viloyati va Tyanszin shahri oâ€˜rtasida sheriklik munosabatlarini oâ€˜rnatish toâ€˜gâ€˜risida;
â€“ Oâ€˜zbekiston Savdo-sanoat palatasi va Xitoy Xalqaro savdoga koâ€˜maklashish kengashi oâ€˜rtasidagi hamkorlik toâ€˜gâ€˜risida.

TITLE: ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ĞºÑĞ¿ Ò›Ğ¸Ñ€Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ò³Ğ°Ñ€ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğº ÑˆĞµÑ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ´Ğ° ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞºÑÑ€Ğ¸Ğ± Ñ‡Ğ¸Ò›Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€

ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ĞºÑĞ¿ Ò›Ğ¸Ñ€Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ò³Ğ°Ñ€ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğº ÑˆĞµÑ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ½Ğ°Ğ´Ğ° ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞºÑÑ€Ğ¸Ğ± Ñ‡Ğ¸Ò›Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€
24.01.2024
24 ÑĞ½Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€ÑŒ ĞºÑƒĞ½Ğ¸ ĞŸĞµĞºĞ¸Ğ½ ÑˆĞ°Ò³Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ²ĞºĞ°Ñ‚ ĞœĞ¸Ñ€Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‘ĞµĞ² Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¥Ğ°Ğ»Ò› Ğ ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°ÑĞ¸ Ğ Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ Ğ¡Ğ¸ Ğ¦Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½ÑŒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¼Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ´ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ³Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ°ÑŠĞ·Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ·Ğ¾ĞºĞ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ±ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ğ± ÑÑ‚Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ£Ñ‡Ñ€Ğ°ÑˆÑƒĞ² Ğ°Ğ²Ğ²Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆÑ€Ğ¸Ñ„ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ ĞºĞµĞ»Ğ¸Ñˆ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ»Ğ¸Ñ„Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° ĞºÑÑ€ÑĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ò› Ğ¼ĞµÒ³Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ´ÑÑÑ‚Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¯Ğ½Ğ³Ğ¸ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ò³Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ÑĞºÑĞ°Ğº ÑÑŠÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ„Ğ¸ ÑƒÑ‡ÑƒĞ½ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ”Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚ Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ĞºĞµĞ¹Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¸ĞºĞºĞ¸ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ° Ğ¼ÑƒĞ½Ğ¾ÑĞ°Ğ±Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞºÑƒÑ‡Ğ»Ğ¸ ÑÑƒÑ€ÑŠĞ°Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ° ÑÑ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑŠĞºĞ¸Ğ´Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€.
Ğ‘Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‡Ğ° Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ° Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ò›Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ±, ÑĞ¸Ñ‘ÑĞ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾Ò›Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ¼ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ò³ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ± Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸, Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ¼ÑƒÒ³Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ ÑĞ·Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€-Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›ÑĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±-Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ò³Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ½ÑƒĞ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ´ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
ĞÑ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ» Ğ½Ğ¾ÑĞ±Ñ€ÑŒ Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞŸĞµĞºĞ¸Ğ½ ÑˆĞ°Ò³Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¢Ğ°ÑˆÒ›Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ²Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»Ğ¾Ò›Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ¸ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ò“Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸ Ğ±ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ğ± ÑÑ‚Ğ´Ğ¸. ĞŸĞ°Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ´Ğ¸.
ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ¥Ğ¥Ğ  Ğ Ğ°Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ³Ğ° ĞºĞ°Ğ¼Ğ±Ğ°Ò“Ğ°Ğ»Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞºĞ° Ò›Ğ°Ñ€ÑˆĞ¸ ĞºÑƒÑ€Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ñˆ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞºĞ° ÑˆĞ°Ñ…ÑĞ°Ğ½ ÑÑŠÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€ Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ò›ÑĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±-Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑƒÑ‡ÑƒĞ½ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆĞ°ĞºĞºÑƒÑ€ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¢Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ â€œĞ›Ñƒ Ğ‘Ğ°Ğ½ÑŒ ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°ÑĞ¸â€ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ„ĞµÑÑĞ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ» Ñ‚Ğ°ÑŠĞ»Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¶Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ¸Ò³Ğ° Ğ±Ğ¾ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ğ»Ò›Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€.
Ğ¡Ğ°Ğ²Ğ´Ğ¾-Ğ¸Ò›Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑĞ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸ÑĞ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ» Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¼Ğ¾Ò›Ğ´Ğ°.
ĞÑ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ» ÑĞºÑƒĞ½Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ±Ğ¾ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñˆ 14 Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ³Ğ° ĞµÑ‚Ğ´Ğ¸. Ğ¯Ò›Ğ¸Ğ½ Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ò›Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ´Ğ° Ğ±ÑƒĞ½Ğ¸ 20 Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ³Ğ° ĞµÑ‚ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñˆ ÑƒÑ‡ÑƒĞ½ Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‡Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸ Ñ‚ÑÒ“Ñ€Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ° ÑĞºĞ´Ğ¸Ğ» Ñ„Ğ¸ĞºÑ€ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
ĞšĞµĞ¹Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ¸Ò›Ñ‚Ğ¸ÑĞ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ±ĞµÑˆ Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€, Ò›ÑÑˆĞ¼Ğ° ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ ÑĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑÑĞ° ÑƒÑ‡ Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ¾ÑˆĞ´Ğ¸.
Ğ˜Ğ½Ñ„Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ÑƒĞ·Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ°, ÑĞ°Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ°Ñ‚ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¾Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸ÑÑĞ¸, Ò›Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ¾Ò› Ñ…ÑĞ¶Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° â€œÑÑˆĞ¸Ğ»â€ ÑĞ½ĞµÑ€Ğ³ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ğ´Ğ° Ñ‚ĞµÑ…Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑÑ„ĞµÑ€Ğ¸ ÑĞ¾Ò³Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ´Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‘Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñˆ Ğ²Ğ° Ò›Ğ°Ğ±ÑƒĞ» Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° ĞºĞµĞ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ± Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¨Ñƒ Ğ¼Ğ°ÑŠĞ½Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°, ÑÑ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ» Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾ĞºĞ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ 1000 Ğ¼ĞµĞ³Ğ°Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¸ĞºĞºĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ° ÑĞ½Ğ³Ğ¸ Ò›ÑƒÑ‘Ñˆ ÑĞ»ĞµĞºÑ‚Ñ€ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ñ†Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ñ„Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ´Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¿ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ½ÑƒĞ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ´ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ°Ğ½ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸, â€œĞ˜Ğ¿Ğ°Ğº Ğ¹ÑĞ»Ğ¸â€ Ñ„Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° ĞÑĞ¸Ñ‘ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ„Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ÑƒĞ·Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸ÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ±Ğ°Ğ½ĞºĞ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸ÑĞ²Ğ¸Ğ¹-Ñ‚ĞµÑ…Ğ½Ğ¸Ğº Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ±ÑƒĞ³ÑƒĞ½Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ°ÑĞ¸ ÑÒ›Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ°Ò³Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ”Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ¸Ò³Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›ÑĞ»Ğ»Ğ°Ğ±-Ò›ÑƒĞ²Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸ÑĞ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ²Ğ¾ÑĞ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ, Ğ¶ÑƒĞ¼Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½, Ò›ÑÑˆĞ¼Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ° ÑÑ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞºĞµĞ»Ğ¸ÑˆÑƒĞ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ³Ğ° ÑÑ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸, ÑˆÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³Ğ´ĞµĞº, Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ­ĞºÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ±Ğ°Ğ½ĞºĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ¢Ğ¾ÑˆĞºĞµĞ½Ñ‚ ÑˆĞ°Ò³Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞœĞ°Ñ€ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ¹ ĞÑĞ¸Ñ‘ ÑƒÑ‡ÑƒĞ½ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¾Ñ„Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ¸Ñˆ Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ğ»Ò›Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸.
ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ·Ğ¸Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ· Ñ…Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº ÑˆĞµÑ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚ ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ±Ğ°Ğ½ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ…ÑƒÑÑƒÑĞ¸Ğ¹Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¶Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‘Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¾Ğ» Ğ¸ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğº ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° Ñ‡Ğ°Ò›Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ•Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ò³ÑƒĞ´ÑƒĞ´Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½ÑƒĞ²Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ½ÑƒĞ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€. Ğ‘Ñƒ Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ²Ğ¾Ñ„Ğ¸Ò›Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ ÑƒÑ‡ÑƒĞ½ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ò³ÑƒĞ´ÑƒĞ´Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ĞºĞµĞ½Ğ³Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚ÑƒĞ·Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° ĞºĞµĞ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ¸Ğ± Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€.
â€œĞ‘Ğ¸Ñ€ Ğ¼Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ½, Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€ Ğ¹ÑĞ»â€ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆĞ°Ğ±Ğ±ÑƒÑĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¢Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑĞ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚ Ğ²Ğ° Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‚ ĞºÑĞ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ¼ÑƒÒ³Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€ĞºĞ¸Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ò›Ğ¸ÑĞ¼Ğ¸ Ğ±ÑĞ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ â€œĞ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ â€“ ÒšĞ¸Ñ€Ò“Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ - ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½â€ Ñ‚ĞµĞ¼Ğ¸Ñ€ Ğ¹ÑĞ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›ÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ±ÑĞ¹Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ° Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚ĞµĞ· Ñ„ÑƒÑ€ÑĞ°Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ° Ğ±Ğ¾ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñˆ Ğ¼ÑƒÒ³Ğ¸Ğ¼ ÑĞºĞ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑŠĞºĞ¸Ğ´Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸.
ĞšÑƒĞ½Ğ¸ ĞºĞµÑ‡Ğ° ĞŸĞµĞºĞ¸Ğ½Ğ´Ğ° Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑŠĞ»Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼Ğ¸, Ğ¨Ğ°Ğ½Ñ…Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ´Ğ° ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ñ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼ Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ĞºÑÑ€Ğ³Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ¸ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ²Ğ°Ñ„Ñ„Ğ°Ò›Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ»Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ò›Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ´ ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸. Ğ¨Ñƒ ĞºÑƒĞ½Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ ĞºÑƒĞ½Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ´Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ…Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ğ°Ò³Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¼ĞµÒ³Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ñ‚Ğ° Ò›Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¸Ò›Ğ¸Ñˆ ÑƒĞ¹Ò“Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ¢Ğ°ÑŠĞ»Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ²Ğ° Ñ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼ ÑĞ¾Ò³Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ĞºĞ¾Ñ€Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ½Ğ¸ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ, ÑĞ·Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ ĞºÑƒĞ½Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¼ ÑÑ‚Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ·Ğ°Ñ€ÑƒÑ€Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ³Ğ¸ ĞºÑÑ€ÑĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ± ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸. ÒšÑÑˆĞ¼Ğ° ĞÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ñˆ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ»Ğ¸Ñ„ Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸.
Ğ ĞµĞ¶Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‡Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ´Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ÑÑƒÑ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆĞ°Ğ±Ğ±ÑƒÑĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ³Ğ° Ğ¾ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñˆ Ğ¼Ğ°Ò›ÑĞ°Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ Ò²ÑƒĞºÑƒĞ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ Ò›ÑĞ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ° Ğ²Ğ° ÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‡Ğ° ĞºĞ¸Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğº Ò›ÑĞ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ò“Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ğ¶Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ¸ ÑÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ÑÑ‚ĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° Ğ°Ò³Ğ´Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ± Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
ĞœĞ¸Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ò›Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹ ĞºÑƒĞ½ Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ¸ Ğ²Ğ° Ñ…Ğ°Ğ»Ò›Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¾ ÑĞ¸Ñ‘ÑĞ°Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ·Ğ°Ñ€Ğ± Ğ¼Ğ°ÑĞ°Ğ»Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸ ÑĞ·Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼ Ñ„Ğ¸ĞºÑ€ Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¼Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸.
â€œĞ¯Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹â€ ÑĞ¸Ñ‘ÑĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¸ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ´Ğ° â€œÑƒÑ‡ Ñ‘Ğ²ÑƒĞ· ĞºÑƒÑ‡â€Ğ³Ğ° Ò›Ğ°Ñ€ÑˆĞ¸ ĞºÑƒÑ€Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ñˆ Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ°ÑĞ¸Ğ´Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ ÑĞ·Ğ³Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ ÑĞºĞ°Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑĞ´Ğ¸Ò›Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ğ¸.
ĞœÑƒĞ·Ğ¾ĞºĞ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ»Ğ°Ñ€ ÑĞºÑƒĞ½Ğ¸Ğ´Ğ° ĞĞ·Ğ±ĞµĞºĞ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ½ ĞµÑ‚Ğ°ĞºÑ‡Ğ¸ÑĞ¸ Ğ¥Ğ¥Ğ  Ñ€Ğ°Ò³Ğ±Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸ Ñ‚Ğ°ÑˆÑ€Ğ¸Ñ„ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ»Ğ°ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ³Ğ° ĞºĞµĞ»Ğ¸ÑˆĞ³Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ»Ğ¸Ñ„ Ò›Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ´Ğ¸ Ò³Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ´Ğ° Ğ´ÑÑÑ‚ Ğ¥Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ñ…Ğ°Ğ»Ò›Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³ ÑÒ›Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ± ĞºĞµĞ»Ğ°Ñ‘Ñ‚Ğ³Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ…Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¹Ñ‡Ğ° Ğ¯Ğ½Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ¹Ğ¸Ğ» â€“ â€œĞ§ÑƒĞ½ÑŒ Ğ¦Ğ·Ğµâ€ Ğ±Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ½ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ñ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¸.

### 237

TITLE: Oâ€˜zbekiston va Xitoy yetakchilari koâ€˜p qirrali va har tomonlama strategik sheriklikni yanada kengaytirish masalalarini koâ€˜rib chiqdilar

Oâ€˜zbekiston va Xitoy yetakchilari koâ€˜p qirrali va har tomonlama strategik sheriklikni yanada kengaytirish masalalarini koâ€˜rib chiqdilar
24.01.2024
24-yanvar kuni Pekin shahrida Oâ€˜zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti Shavkat Mirziyoyev va Xitoy Xalq Respublikasi Raisi Si Szinpinning rasmiy delegatsiyalar aâ€™zolari ishtirokidagi muzokaralari boâ€˜lib oâ€˜tdi.
Uchrashuv avvalida Prezidentimiz Xitoy yetakchisiga tashrif bilan kelish taklifi va koâ€˜rsatilayotgan iliq mehmondoâ€˜stlik hamda Yangi Oâ€˜zbekistondagi islohotlarning yuksak eâ€™tirofi uchun samimiy minnatdorlik bildirdi.
Davlat rahbarlari keyingi yillarda ikki tomonlama munosabatlar rivojida kuchli surâ€™atga erishilganini taâ€™kidladilar.
Barcha darajalarda aloqalar faollashib, siyosiy muloqot mustahkamlanib borayotgani, mamlakatlarimiz muhim masalalar yuzasidan bir-birini qoâ€˜llab-quvvatlayotgani alohida mamnuniyat bilan qayd etildi.
Oâ€˜tgan yil noyabr oyida Pekin shahrida Tashqi ishlar vazirlari strategik muloqotining birinchi yigâ€˜ilishi boâ€˜lib oâ€˜tdi. Parlamentlararo hamkorlik faollashdi.
Prezidentimiz XXR Raisiga kambagâ€˜allikka qarshi kurashish boâ€˜yicha hamkorlikka shaxsan eâ€™tibor qarayotgani va qoâ€˜llab-quvvatlayotgani uchun tashakkur bildirdi.
Tomonlar Oâ€˜zbekistonda Xitoyning â€œLu Ban ustaxonasiâ€ professional taâ€™lim tizimini joriy qilish boâ€˜yicha pilot loyiha boshlanganini olqishladilar.
Savdo-iqtisodiy va investitsiyaviy hamkorlik jadal rivojlanmoqda.
Oâ€˜tgan yil yakunlari boâ€˜yicha tovar ayirboshlash 14 milliard dollarga yetdi. Yaqin istiqbolda buni 20 milliard dollarga yetkazish uchun barcha imkoniyatlar borligi toâ€˜gâ€˜risida yakdil fikr bildirildi.
Keyingi yillarda Xitoydan Oâ€˜zbekiston iqtisodiyotiga investitsiyalar hajmi besh barobar, qoâ€˜shma korxonalar soni esa uch barobar oshdi.
Infratuzilma, sanoat kooperatsiyasi, qishloq xoâ€˜jaligi va â€œyashilâ€ energetikada texnologiyalar transferi sohalarida hamkorlik dasturlarini tayyorlash va qabul qilishga kelishib olindi.
Shu maâ€™noda, oâ€˜tgan yil oxirida Oâ€˜zbekistonda Xitoy kompaniyalari ishtirokida quvvati 1000 megavattlik ikkita yangi quyosh elektr stansiyalari foydalanishga topshirilgani mamnuniyat bilan qayd etildi.
Xitoyning yetakchi banklari, â€œIpak yoâ€˜liâ€ fondi va Osiyo infratuzilmaviy investitsiyalar banki bilan samarali moliyaviy-texnik hamkorlikning bugungi darajasi yuqori baholandi.
Davlatimiz rahbari investitsiya loyihalarini qoâ€˜llab-quvvatlashning moliyaviy vositalarini kengaytirish, jumladan, qoâ€˜shma platforma yaratish borasida kelishuvlarga erishilganini, shuningdek, Xitoy Eksimbankining Toshkent shahrida Markaziy Osiyo uchun mintaqaviy ofis ochish qarorini olqishladi.
Prezidentimiz xitoylik sheriklarni Oâ€˜zbekistondagi davlat korxonalari va banklarini xususiylashtirish jarayonlarida faol ishtirok etishga chaqirdi.
Yetakchilar hududlararo almashinuvlar faollashganiga mamnuniyat bildirdilar. Bu boradagi hamkorlikni muvofiqlashtirish uchun Oâ€˜zbekiston va Xitoy hududlari kengashini tuzishga kelishib oldilar.
â€œBir makon, bir yoâ€˜lâ€ tashabbusi doirasida Transmintaqaviy transport va tranzit koâ€˜prigining muhim tarkibiy qismi boâ€˜ladigan â€œXitoy â€“ Qirgâ€˜iziston - Oâ€˜zbekistonâ€ temir yoâ€˜lini qurish boâ€˜yicha amaliy ishlarni tez fursatda boshlash muhim ekani taâ€™kidlandi.
Kuni kecha Pekinda birinchi taâ€™lim forumi, Shanxayda Oâ€˜zbekistonning turizm imkoniyatlari koâ€˜rgazmasi muvaffaqiyatli oâ€˜tgani qayd etildi. Shu kunlarda oâ€˜tayotgan Oâ€˜zbekiston madaniyati kunlari doirasidagi tadbirlar Xitoy poytaxti aholisi va mehmonlarida katta qiziqish uygâ€˜otdi.
Taâ€™lim va turizm sohasidagi hamkorlikni faollashtirish, oâ€˜zaro madaniyat kunlarini oâ€˜tkazish amaliyotini davom ettirish zarurligi koâ€˜rsatib oâ€˜tildi. Qoâ€˜shma Yoshlar innovatsiya forumini oâ€˜tkazish taklif qilindi.
Rejalashtirilgan barcha tadbirlar va ilgari surilgan tashabbuslarni amalga oshirish maqsadida tomonlar Hukumatlararo qoâ€˜mita va uning barcha kichik qoâ€˜mitalari yigâ€˜ilishlarini joriy yilning birinchi yarmida oâ€˜tkazishga ahdlashib oldi.
Mintaqaviy kun tartibi va xalqaro siyosatning dolzarb masalalari yuzasidan ham fikr almashildi.
â€œYagona Xitoyâ€ siyosati hamda â€œuch yovuz kuchâ€ga qarshi kurashish borasidagi pozitsiya oâ€˜zgarmas ekani tasdiqlandi.
Muzokaralar yakunida Oâ€˜zbekiston yetakchisi XXR rahbarini tashrif bilan mamlakatimizga kelishga taklif qildi hamda doâ€˜st Xitoy xalqining yaqinlashib kelayotgan xitoycha Yangi yil â€“ â€œChun Szeâ€ bayrami bilan tabrikladi.
Uchrashuv har doimgidek ishonch, ochiqlik va doâ€˜stlik ruhida oâ€˜tdi.

### 240
URL: https://www.predsednik.rs/en/president
TITLE: President
    | The President of the Republic of Serbia

President
Constitutional jurisdiction of the President of the Republic
(Articles 111 through 121 of the Constitution of the Republic of Serbia)
Position of the President of the Republic
Article 111
The President of the Republic expresses the state integrity of the Republic of Serbia.
Jurisdiction
Article 112
The President of the Republic represents the Republic of Serbia in the country and abroad, pronounces laws by decree, in accordance with the Constitution, proposes the prime minister designate to the Serbian Parliament, after obtaining the opinions of representatives of the elected tickets, proposes the candidates for office to the Serbian Parliament, in accordance with the Constitution and the law, appoints and recalls ambassadors of the Republic of Serbia, by decree and on the basis of proposals from the government, receives the credentials and letters of recall of foreign diplomatic representatives, grants pardons, presents decorations and performs other tasks regulated by the Constitution.
In accordance with the law, the President of the Republic is in command of the military and appoints, promotes and recalls officers of the Army of Serbia.
Promulgation of laws
Article 113
The President of the Republic is obliged to bring a decree on the promulgation of a law, or to return the law to the Serbian Parliament for a repeated debate, with a written explanation, no later than 15 days after the passage of the law in the Parliament, and no later than seven days if the law was passed in urgent procedure.
If the Serbian Parliament decides to vote again on the law that the President of the Republic has returned, the law is passed with the majority of the total number of deputies.
The President of the Republic is obliged to promulgate the law that has been passed a second time.
If the President of the Republic fails to bring a decree on promulgating the law within the deadline set by the Constitution, the Speaker of Parliament brings the decree.
Election to office
Article 114
The President of the Republic is elected at direct elections, by secret ballot, in accordance with the law.
The Speaker of Parliament schedules elections for the President of the Republic, 90 days before the expiry of the mandate of the President, so that elections are completed within 60 days, in accordance with the law.
When taking office, the President of the Republic takes the following oath before the Serbian Parliament:
"I do solemnly swear that I shall dedicate my power to the preservation of the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the Republic of Serbia, including Kosovo and Metohija as its integral part, and to the implementation of human and minority rights and freedoms, to the respect and protection of the Constitution and laws, the preservation of peace and the well being of all citizens of the Republic of Serbia and that I will conscientiously and responsibly perform all my duties."
Incompatibility of functions
Article 115
The President of the Republic may not perform any other public function or professional activity.
Mandate
Article 116
The mandate of the President of the Republic lasts for five years, beginning from the day when he takes the presidential oath before the Serbian Parliament.
If the mandate of the President of the Republic expires during a state of war or emergency, it is extended till three months after the end of the state of war or emergency.
No one may be elected President of the Republic more than twice.
The mandate of the President of the Republic ends with the expiry of the term in office for which he was elected, or with his resignation or impeachment.
The President of the Republic submits his resignation to the Speaker of the Serbian Parliament.
Resignation
Article 117
When the president of the Republic resigns, he informs the public and the Speaker of the Serbian Parliament of this.
The mandate of the President of the Republic ends on the day of his resignation.
Impeachment
Article 118
The President of the Republic is impeached if he violates the Constitution, by the Serbian Parliament, with the minimum majority of two thirds.
The impeachment procedure can be initiated by the Serbian Parliament, on the initiative of at least one third of the deputies.
Upon the initiation of the impeachment procedure, the Constitutional Court is obliged to pronounce whether a violation of the Constitution exists, within 45 days at the latest.
Immunity
Article 119
The President of the Republic enjoys immunity like the deputies of the Parliament.
The Serbian Parliament decides on the president's immunity.
Replacing the President of the Republic
Article 120
When the President of the Republic is unable to perform his duty or his mandate expires before the end of the term he was elected for, the Speaker of the Serbian Parliament replaces him.
The Speaker of the Serbian Parliament can replace the president for the period of no longer than three months.
The Speaker of the Serbian Parliament is obliged to announce presidential elections in the way that elections are held no later than three months after the president ceased to be capable, or after the ending of his mandate.
Law on the President of the Republic
Article 121
A law is passed on the President of the Republic.
Share

### 241
URL: https://www.predsednik.rs/en/president/biography
TITLE: Biography
    | The President of the Republic of Serbia

Biography
Official photo of the President of the Republic of Serbia Aleksandar VuÄiÄ‡/ Photo Presidency: Dimitrije Goll
Aleksandar VuÄiÄ‡
President of the Republic of Serbia
He was born on March 5, 1970, in Belgrade. In 1988 he graduated from â€œZemunska gimnazijaâ€, and from the Faculty of Law, University of Belgrade, in 1994.
He joined the Serbian Radical Party in 1993. The same year he was elected an MP into the National Assembly of the Republic of Serbia in 1993, and he was elected the Secretary General of the Serbian Radical party in 1994. He stayed in that position until 2008.
He became the Director of the â€œPinkiâ€ business and sport center in Zemun, in 1996. He managed to reconstruct these neglected sports facilities, and with successful operation he multiplied the incomes of the employees.
He was appointed the Minister of Information in 1998, by the Government of National Unity.
MP in the Federal Assembly of the SRY, in three terms of office: Council of the Republic as of February 1998 and as of May 2000 and on September 24, 2000 he was elected in federal elections.
In Belgrade mayoral elections, â€œVuÄiÄ‡ for Metropolisâ€ he won 29% of the votes in the first round, i.e. 48% of the votes in the second round. In Belgrade mayoral elections, held in May 2008, he won 316.357 votes, i.e. 34, 7%.
Together with Tomislav NikoliÄ‡, he founded the Serbian Progressive Party, and at the Founding Convention in October 2008, he was elected Partyâ€™s Deputy President.
After general parliamentary elections, held in 2012, he was appointed the Minister of Defense and the First Deputy Prime Minister, in charge of fight against crime and corruption.
After Tomislav NikoliÄ‡ had resigned from the position of the President of the Serbian Progressive Party, after Presidential elections in 2012 he became an acting leader of the Serbian Progressive Party, on 24 May 2012. At the Second Party Congress, held on 29 September 2012, he was unanimously elected for the President of the Serbian Progressive Party.
He performed the duty of the Defense Minister from July 28, 2012, until the reshuffle of the Government of the Republic of Serbia, on September 2, 2013.
He has been participating actively in negotiations between the Government of the Republic of Serbia and Provisional Institutions of Self-Government in Pristina, under the auspices of the European Union. He made a contribution to the signing of the Brussels Agreement in April 2013, whereby, for the first time since 1999, the realistic basis has been created for Serbian people living in Kosovo and Metohija to establish institutions that would be recognized by the international community.
As of September 2013, he kept only the position of the First Deputy Prime Minister, in charge of fighting crime and corruption.
After the Serbian Progressive Partyâ€™s victory in the elections held on 16 March 2014, he was elected for the Prime Minister of Serbia, in the Government formed on 27 April 2014. He held that position until August 2016, when, after the elections held on 24 April 2016, he began a new term as the Prime Minister of Serbia.
The Government that was lead by Aleksandar Vucic reached a historical success by implementing the most difficult economic reforms in modern Serbian history. By temporarily cutting pensions and salaries in public sector he saved Serbia from bankruptcy, recovered the budget and started to decrease Serbia's public debt.
After the victory in the Presidential elections on 2 April 2017, he was appointed for the President of the Republic of Serbia.
He sees Serbia as an economically reconstructed, organized, modern European country; regional leader in economy, politics, infrastructure energy, stability of any kind, affirmation of human right and freedoms but also in education, culture, science, enlightenment sports and natality.
He won â€œKapetan MiÅ¡a AnastasijeviÄ‡â€ award in 2012 for the Personality of the Year, as well as the â€œPersonality of the Year 2013â€, by â€œNezavisne novineâ€, Bosnia and Herzegovina.
Additionally, he won the following awards as well: â€œMan of the Year 2013â€, by the European magazine â€œThe Manâ€; â€œThe most European of the Year 2013â€, by the international organization â€œThe First European Houseâ€; â€œVidovdan Award of 2013â€, given by the City of KruÅ¡evac and â€œ2014 Regional Leaderâ€ award by the regional jury and readers of â€œVeÄernji listâ€ from Bosnia and Herzegovina.
He is a passionate reader, particularly of literature from the field of historiography and geopolitics, but also Serbian and world literature; heâ€™s the owner of quite a big personal library.
He plays chess, likes to watch football and basketball.
He is fluent in English and Russian, with basic knowledge of French and he is studying German.
Married with Tamara Vucic, father of Danilo, Milica and Vukan
Share

### 242
URL: https://www.predsednik.rs/en/president/responsibilities
TITLE: Responsibilities
    | The President of the Republic of Serbia

Responsibilities
Responsibilities of the President of the Republic of Serbia
The President of the Republic shall be elected at direct elections, by secret ballot.
The term of office of the President shall last five years, and begin from the day of taking of the oath before the National Assembly.
The President of the Republic shall express state unity of the Republic of Serbia and represent the Republic of Serbia in the country and abroad.
The President of the Republic shall propose to the National Assembly a candidate for Prime Minister whenever a new Government is elected and shall be obliged to propose the candidate who can ensure election of Government.
The President of the Republic may return a promulgated law to the National Assembly for reconsideration if he/she considers that the law is not in line with the Constitution or that it is in contravention of the endorsed international treaties or the generally accepted rules of international law or that the law was adopted without respecting the procedure stipulated for the adoption of laws or that the law does not regulate a certain area appropriately.
The President of the Republic may, in accordance with the Constitution and the law, dissolve the National Assembly at the proposal and with the explanation of the Government and take a decision on calling elections for deputies of the National Assembly.
The President of the Republic shall issue a decree on the promulgation of laws, dissolve the National Assembly, appoint and recall Ambassadors of the Republic of Serbia, award honours and appoint, promote and dismiss officers of the Army of Serbia. By adopting a decision, the President of the Republic shall call elections for national deputies, propose to the National Assembly a candidate for Prime Minister, grant amnesties, appoint the Secretary General to the President of the Republic, the Chief of Office of the President of the Republic, advisors to the President of the Republic and other officials of the General Secretariat of the President of the Republic.
President of the Republic shall command the Army and appoint, promote and dismiss officers of the Army of Serbia.
Regulations applied in the exercise of powers by the President of the Republic
